parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

questions.text_audio:
A. She's searching in her handbag
B. She's looking in a display case
C. She's paying for a purchase
D. She's holding some flowers
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang tìm \u0111\u1ed3 trong túi xách c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang nhìn vào m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc t\u1ee7 tr\u01b0ng bày<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang tr\u1ea3 ti\u1ec1n \u0111\u1ec3 mua hàng<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang c\u1ea7m vài bông hoa<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang nh\u00ecn v\u00e0o m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc t\u1ee7 tr\u01b0ng b\u00e0y","en":"She's looking in a display case"}

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
When did you buy your new phone?
A. The store is close to my house
B. Last week when it was on sale
C. I think it's the same number
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea1n mua \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i m\u1edbi khi nào?<\/p>

A. C\u1eeda hàng g\u1ea7n nhà tôi<\/p>

B. Tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m giá<\/p>

C. Tôi ngh\u0129 \u0111ó là cùng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Last week when it was on sale; d\u1ecbch: Tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m gi\u00e1"}

{"vn":"

A. \u0110\u00f3 l\u00e0 logo ch\u00ednh th\u1ee9c<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t ph\u00f2ng<\/p>

C. C\u0103n ph\u00f2ng n\u1eb1m \u1edf t\u1ea7ng hai <\/span><\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n c\u00f3 bi\u1ebft v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng c\u1ee7a Keiko \u1edf \u0111\u00e2u kh\u00f4ng? C. C\u0103n ph\u00f2ng n\u1eb1m \u1edf t\u1ea7ng hai"}

C. Trong vài ngày n\u1eefa<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Bài t\u1eadp này không ph\u1ea3i h\u1ea1n cu\u1ed1i là tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc sao?<\/p>

B. Ký \u1edf cu\u1ed1i trang<\/p>

C. Không, b\u1ea1n không c\u1ea7n xin phép<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u00e0i t\u1eadp n\u00e0y kh\u00f4ng ph\u1ea3i h\u1ea1n cu\u1ed1i l\u00e0 tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc sao?  A. N\u00f3 t\u1ed1n nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian h\u01a1n ch\u00fang t\u00f4i ngh\u0129"}

C. Anh \u1ea5y c\u0169ng làm vi\u1ec7c trong tòa nhà \u0111ó ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"H\u00e3y th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 c\u00e1c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf t\u00f2a nh\u00e0 s\u00e1ng nay  A. Ch\u00fang ta c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 l\u00e0m \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111\u00f3 v\u00e0o chi\u1ec1u nay"}

questions.text_audio:
Why is there a cake sitting out on the front desk?

B. I'll answer the phone
C. Because Barb's party is today
questions.text_audio_trans:

T\u1ea1i sao l\u1ea1i có m\u1ed9t cái bánh \u1edf trên qu\u1ea7y l\u1ec5 tân?<\/p>

A. Ch\u1eadu cây \u1edf trên m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ea5t<\/p>

B. Tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i<\/p>

C. Vì hôm nay có ti\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a Barb<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u1ea1i sao l\u1ea1i c\u00f3 m\u1ed9t c\u00e1i b\u00e1nh \u1edf tr\u00ean qu\u1ea7y l\u1ec5 t\u00e2n? C. V\u00ec h\u00f4m nay c\u00f3 ti\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a Barb"}

questions.text_audio:
How are we going to move all of these office chairs?

C. Have a seat by the window

Chúng ta s\u1ebd di chuy\u1ec3n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc gh\u1ebf v\u0103n phòng này nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

A. Sergio s\u1ebd giúp chúng ta<\/p>

B. Bên kia hành lang<\/p>

C. B\u1ea1n vui lòng ng\u1ed3i c\u1ea1nh c\u1eeda s\u1ed5<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ch\u00fang ta s\u1ebd di chuy\u1ec3n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc gh\u1ebf v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng n\u00e0y nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o?  A. Sergio s\u1ebd gi\u00fap ch\u00fang ta"}

Have you gone to the leadership training yet?

B. Sure, we can leave some for you

questions.text_audio_trans:

C. Tôi không bi\u1ebft \u0111ó là yêu c\u1ea7u<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n \u0111\u00e3 tham gia \u0111\u00e0o t\u1ea1o l\u00e3nh \u0111\u1ea1o ch\u01b0a? C. T\u00f4i kh\u00f4ng bi\u1ebft \u0111\u00f3 l\u00e0 y\u00eau c\u1ea7u"}

A. \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t ý t\u01b0\u1edfng r\u1ea5t hay<\/p>

C. M\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m là \u0111\u1ee7<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u1ea1i sao ch\u00fang ta kh\u00f4ng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng kh\u00e1n gi\u1ea3 tr\u1ebb h\u01a1n?  A. \u0110\u00f3 l\u00e0 m\u1ed9t \u00fd t\u01b0\u1edfng r\u1ea5t hay"}

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Thanks for calling Riverside Auto Repair. How can I help you?

W-Br: Hi. I got my car repaired last week and used your shuttle service to get a ride back to my office. Can you tell me why there's a service charge on my invoice for using the shuttle? I've never had to pay that before.

M-Cn: Yes, unfortunately the cost of auto fuel has risen quite a bit, so the company now requires us to charge for the shuttle.

W-Br: Well, I wasn't expecting that.

M-Cn: I'm sorry we didn't inform you of this ahead of time. I'll waive the fee now, but please be aware that you'll have to pay for rides in the future. 

Dịch: M-Cn: Cảm ơn bạn đã gọi cho Riverside Auto Repair. Tôi có thể giúp gì cho bạn không?

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi đã sửa xe vào tuần trước và sử dụng dịch vụ đưa đón của bạn để trở về văn phòng của tôi. Bạn có thể cho tôi biết tại sao lại có phí dịch vụ trên hóa đơn khi sử dụng xe đưa đón không? Tôi chưa bao giờ phải trả tiền đó trước đây.

M-Cn: Vâng, thật không may, chi phí nhiên liệu ô tô đã tăng lên khá nhiều, vì vậy công ty hiện yêu cầu chúng tôi tính phí xe đưa đón.

W-Br: Chà, tôi không mong đợi điều đó.

M-Cn: Tôi xin lỗi vì chúng tôi đã không thông báo cho bạn về điều này trước thời hạn. Tôi sẽ loại bỏ khoản phí đó ngay bây giờ, nhưng xin lưu ý rằng bạn sẽ phải trả phí cho các chuyến đi trong tương lai.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho Riverside Auto Repair. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n không?<\/p>

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi \u0111ã s\u1eeda xe vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc và s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1edf v\u1ec1 v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 cho tôi bi\u1ebft t\u1ea1i sao l\u1ea1i có phí d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 trên hóa \u0111\u01a1n khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng xe \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón không? Tôi ch\u01b0a bao gi\u1edd ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 ti\u1ec1n \u0111ó tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây.<\/p>

M-Cn: Vâng, th\u1eadt không may, chi phí nhiên li\u1ec7u ô tô \u0111ã t\u0103ng lên khá nhi\u1ec1u, vì v\u1eady công ty hi\u1ec7n yêu c\u1ea7u chúng tôi tính phí xe \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón.<\/p>

W-Br: Chà, tôi không mong \u0111\u1ee3i \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi xin l\u1ed7i vì chúng tôi \u0111ã không thông báo cho b\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u này tr\u01b0\u1edbc th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n. Tôi s\u1ebd lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf kho\u1ea3n phí \u0111ó ngay bây gi\u1edd, nh\u01b0ng xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 phí cho các chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: In sports news, our own Easton Jaguars won today's soccer match against the Portville Lions. Here to tell us about the game is Aaron Park, the goalkeeper for the Jaguars. Mr. Parker, thank for joining us

M-Au: Thanks for having me. Today's game was challenging - it started to rain early on, and the storm didn't let up for nearly an hour. There were several times when we lost control of the ball because the field was so wet and slippery.

W-Am: Well, you all played really well despite the weather. Now, it's time for a commercial break, but stay tuned - we'll soon be back with Aaron Parker to talk about the game's most exciting moments.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Theo tin t\u1ee9c th\u1ec3 thao, Easton Jaguars c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã th\u1eafng tr\u1eadn bóng \u0111á hôm nay tr\u01b0\u1edbc Portville Lions. \u0110ây là Aaron Park, th\u1ee7 môn c\u1ee7a Jaguars s\u1ebd nói cho chúng ta v\u1ec1 chi ti\u1ebft tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u. Anh Parker, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã tham gia bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

M-Au: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã m\u1eddi tôi. Tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u hôm nay \u0111\u1ea7y th\u1eed thách - tr\u1eddi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ed5 m\u01b0a t\u1eeb s\u1edbm và c\u01a1n bão \u0111ã kéo dài trong g\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd. \u0110ã có vài l\u1ea7n chúng tôi m\u1ea5t quy\u1ec1n ki\u1ec3m soát bóng vì sân quá \u01b0\u1edbt và tr\u01a1n.<\/p>

W-Am: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã ch\u01a1i r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t dù th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft không \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9. Bây gi\u1edd là vài phút dành cho qu\u1ea3ng cáo, nh\u01b0ng hãy chú ý theo dõi - chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1edbm tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i v\u1edbi Aaron Parker \u0111\u1ec3 nói v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng kho\u1ea3nh kh\u1eafc thú v\u1ecb nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi Paul, I know we were planning to work at the trade show together next week, but something has come up. Do you think you could find someone else to go in my place?

M-Cn: Sure, that can probably be arranged. Can I ask why you're unable to go? 

W-Br: My department recently hired several new people, and I want to be here to make sure that their training goes smoothly

M-Cn: I understand. I'll call Ramona and ask her if she'd be able to attend the show instead
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào Paul, tôi bi\u1ebft chúng ta có k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i tri\u1ec3n lãm th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi, nh\u01b0ng do có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chuy\u1ec7n. Anh ngh\u0129 có th\u1ec3 tìm m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i thay th\u1ebf tôi không?<\/p>

M-Cn: D\u0129 nhiên r\u1ed3i, tôi có th\u1ec3 s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp chuy\u1ec7n \u0111ó. Nh\u01b0ng tôi có th\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft lý do sao cô không th\u1ec3 \u0111i không?<\/p>

W-Br: B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a tôi g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã thuê m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u1edbi và tôi mu\u1ed1n \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng quá trình \u0111ào t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd di\u1ec5n ra suôn s\u1ebb.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi hi\u1ec3u. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1ecdi cho Ramona và h\u1ecfi cô \u1ea5y xem li\u1ec7u cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n không.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the woman notify the man about?
childrens.answers: ["She is unable to meet a deadline","She needs a replacement laptop","She cannot attend a business trip","She is planning to give a speech"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef thông báo cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111i\u1ec1u gì?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y không th\u1ec3 \u0111áp \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y c\u1ea7n laptop thay th\u1ebf<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y không th\u1ec3 tham gia chuy\u1ebfn công tác<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t bài phát bi\u1ec3u<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin: I know we were planning to work at the trade show together next week, but something has come up. Do you think you could find someone else to go in my place?<\/p>","en":"

What does the woman notify the man about?<\/p>

A. She is unable to meet a deadline<\/p>

B. She needs a replacement laptop<\/p>

C. She cannot attend a business trip<\/p>

D. She is planning to give a speech<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: I know we were planning to work at the trade show together next week, but something has come up. Do you think you could find someone else to go in my place?<\/p>"}

childrens.title: According to the woman, what recently happened in her department?
childrens.answers: ["A corporate policy was updated","A supply order was mishandled","Client contracts were renewed","New employees were hired"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Theo nh\u01b0 ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef thì chuy\u1ec7n gì \u0111ã x\u1ea3y ra \u1edf b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t chính sách h\u1ee3p tác \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t \u0111\u01a1n hàng cung \u1ee9ng b\u1ecb x\u1eed lý sai<\/p>

C. H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng khách hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. Các nhân viên m\u1edbi t\u1edbi làm vi\u1ec7c<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin: My department recently hired several new people<\/p>","en":"

According to the woman, what recently happened in her department?<\/p>

A. A corporate policy was updated<\/p>

B. A supply order was mishandled<\/p>

C. Client contracts were renewed<\/p>

D. New employees were hired<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: My department recently hired several new people<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the man say he will do next?
childrens.answers: ["Speak with a colleague","Conduct an interview","Calculate a budget","Draft a travel itinerary"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói anh ta s\u1ebd làm gì?<\/p>

A. H\u1ecfi \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

B. Th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n<\/p>

C. Tính toán ngân sách<\/p>

D. D\u1ef1 th\u1ea3o m\u1ed9t hành trình du l\u1ecbch<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin: I'll call Ramona and ask her if she'd be able to attend the show instead<\/p>","en":"

What does the man say he will do next?<\/p>

A. Speak with a colleague<\/p>

B. Conduct an interview<\/p>

C. Calculate a budget<\/p>

D. Draft a travel itinerary<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: I'll call Ramona and ask her if she'd be able to attend the show instead<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: I'd like to book two tickets for tonight's city bus tour

W-Am: Sure, we still have seats on the bus. This tour will stop at five different sites and end up the Seven Stars Restaurant

M-Au: Oh. That sounds good. A friend of mine is visiting from out of town. He'll like that

W-Am: Yes, but we have to put in the order for the restaurant in advance. You have a choice between the chicken with vegetables or the beef with rice

M-Au: We'll both have the chicken

W-Am: Here are your tickets. And by the way, we're expecting clear skies tonight. You'll definitely want to bring your camera. You won't want to miss taking photos of the city's skyline
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1eb7t hai vé cho chuy\u1ebfn tham quan xe buýt thành ph\u1ed1 t\u1ed1i nay<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, chúng tôi v\u1eabn còn ch\u1ed7 trên xe buýt. Chuy\u1ebfn tham quan này s\u1ebd d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf n\u0103m \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m khác nhau và k\u1ebft thúc t\u1ea1i Nhà hàng Seven Stars<\/p>

M-Au: \u1ed2. Nghe hay \u0111\u1ea5y. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ang \u1edf ngoài th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m. Anh \u1ea5y s\u1ebd thích \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó<\/p>

W-Am: Vâng, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc cho nhà hàng. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn gi\u1eefa gà v\u1edbi rau ho\u1eb7c th\u1ecbt bò v\u1edbi c\u01a1m<\/p>

M-Au: C\u1ea3 hai chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec1u ch\u1ecdn gà<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110ây là vé c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Và nhân ti\u1ec7n, chúng tôi ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng t\u1ed1i nay tr\u1eddi s\u1ebd khá trong. Ch\u1eafc h\u1eb3n b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd mu\u1ed1n mang theo máy \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a mình. B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 vi\u1ec7c ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng chân tr\u1eddi c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 \u0111âu.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, Siba. Do you need help taking those files up to our office? It looks like you have your hands full

W-Br: If you don't mind, that'd be great. The elevator is still out of order, so we'll have to use the stairs

M-Cn: But that broke last week - the maintenance crew should have repaired that by now

W-Br: Well, apparently a piece of hardware had to be custom made

M-Cn: Ah, I see. Well, at least our office is only on the second floor, so we don't have to climb too many stairs

W-Br: That's true. Thanks again for carrying some of these files - it would have taken two trips to get them all without your help
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào Siba, cô có c\u1ea7n giúp \u0111\u1ee1 mang \u0111\u1ed1ng tài li\u1ec7u \u0111ó lên v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi không? D\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u01b0 cô ph\u1ea3i mang quá nhi\u1ec1u th\u1ee9 r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

W-Br: N\u1ebfu anh không phi\u1ec1n, \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t. Thang máy v\u1eabn không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng, vì v\u1eady chúng tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i \u0111i c\u1ea7u thang b\u1ed9<\/p>

M-Cn: Nó b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc - L\u1ebd ra gi\u1edd \u0111\u1ed9i b\u1ea3o trì ph\u1ea3i s\u1eeda nó r\u1ed3i ch\u1ee9<\/p>

W-Br: Ch\u1eafn là ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee9ng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t làm riêng nên m\u1edbi lâu th\u1ebf<\/p>

M-Cn: À, hi\u1ec3u r\u1ed3i. Ít ra thì v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ch\u1ec9 \u1edf t\u1ea7ng hai, vì v\u1eady chúng ta không ph\u1ea3i leo b\u1ed9 quá nhi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110úng v\u1eady. M\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh \u0111ã mang giúp tôi \u0111\u1ed1ng tài li\u1ec7u này - n\u1ebfu không có anh ch\u1eafc tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111i hai chuy\u1ebfn m\u1ea5t.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why does the woman say, "a piece of hardware had to be custom made"?
childrens.answers: ["To justify a price","To explain a delay","To illustrate a product's age","To express regret for a purchase"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef l\u1ea1i nói \"m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t làm riêng\"?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 cân b\u1eb1ng giá c\u1ea3<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i thích cho s\u1ef1 trì hoãn b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 minh h\u1ecda v\u1ec1 tu\u1ed5i th\u1ecd c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 bày t\u1ecf h\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfc khi \u0111ã mua hàng<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin: But that broke last week - the maintenance crew should have repaired that by now<\/p>","en":"

Why does the woman say, \"a piece of hardware had to be custom made\"?<\/p>

A. To justify a price<\/p>

B. To explain a delay<\/p>

C. To illustrate a product's age<\/p>

D. To express regret for a purchase<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: But that broke last week - the maintenance crew should have repaired that by now<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: All right, let's start the meeting. How were our clothing sales for June?

W-Br: Well, sales went up three percent from last month. But customers didn't respond as well as usual to our big semiannual sale

M-Au: I was hoping for a five percent increase ... Donna, why do you think the increase was so small?

W-Am: I think clothing sales weren't as strong because the advertising budget was cut this year. I'd like to see that money put back into our budget.

M-Au: Hmm ... Let's wait another month. If sales are still low, we may have to increase the advertising budget, but I prefer to wait on that decision.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, chúng ta hãy b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp. Doanh thu qu\u1ea7n áo c\u1ee7a chúng ta trong tháng 6 nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

W-Br: Doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng \u0111ã t\u0103ng 3% so v\u1edbi tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Nh\u01b0ng ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a khách hàng \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ee3t gi\u1ea3m giá l\u1edbn n\u1eeda n\u0103m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n này không t\u1ed1t nh\u01b0 bình th\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

M-Au: Tôi \u0111ã hy v\u1ecdng m\u1ee9c t\u0103ng n\u0103m ph\u1ea7n tr\u0103m ... Donna, t\u1ea1i sao cô ngh\u0129 m\u1ee9c t\u0103ng này quá ít?<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng doanh s\u1ed1 bán qu\u1ea7n áo không t\u0103ng m\u1ea1nh vì ngân sách qu\u1ea3ng cáo \u0111ã b\u1ecb c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m trong n\u0103m nay. Tôi mu\u1ed1n chúng ta v\u1eabn ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 vào ngân sách qu\u1ea3ng cáo.<\/p>

M-Au: Hmm ... Chúng ta hãy \u0111\u1ee3i m\u1ed9t tháng n\u1eefa. N\u1ebfu doanh s\u1ed1 v\u1eabn th\u1ea5p, chúng ta có th\u1ec3 ph\u1ea3i t\u0103ng ngân sách qu\u1ea3ng cáo, nh\u01b0ng tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ee3i thêm h\u01a1n.<\/p>"}

D. Opening another location<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: Let's wait another month. If sales are still low, we may have to increase the advertising budget, but I prefer to wait on that decision.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hello, Dan. so you've been training with us for a couple of months now- as your mentor, I'd like to hear how your apprenticeship's been going

M-Au: It's been going well. I've enjoyed learning the different techniques for metal welding, and like seeing the finished products.

W-Am: I'm glad to hear that. There are still a few weeks left in your training program - but you know, your work is so good that we've decided to offer you a promotion when your training is complete.

M-Au: That's great news! I'd be happy to be part of the team here
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào, Dan. B\u1ea1n \u0111ã tham gia khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a chúng vài tháng nay - v\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách là ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, tôi mu\u1ed1n bi\u1ebft quá trình h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n di\u1ec5n ra nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

M-Au: M\u1ecdi chuy\u1ec7n di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p. Tôi r\u1ea5t thích h\u1ecdc nhi\u1ec1u k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt hàn kim lo\u1ea1i khác nhau và thích nhìn th\u1ea5y các thành ph\u1ea9m.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi bi\u1ebft \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111ào t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n v\u1eabn còn vài tu\u1ea7n n\u1eefa - nh\u01b0ng b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ea5y, công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t nên chúng tôi \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 làm vi\u1ec7c khi khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o hoàn t\u1ea5t.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t tin tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1edf thành m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf \u0111ây.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Well, Dietrich, we're looking forward to seeing you here in our Munich office next Tuesday. We can't wait to see the latest design plans for the company's new, lightweight tablet

M-Cn: Thanks! There's one feature of the tablet that I'm especially pleased with.

W-Br: Really? What is it?

M-Cn: This model has our best battery life ever. It can now operate for three full days on a single charge

W-Br: That's incredible - I'm excited to hear more about this during your presentation. By the way, we made a dinner reservation for our department that evening

M-Cn: Actually, my favorite singer is performing that night

W-Br: That's OK. We ' ll see you soon
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Dietrich, chúng tôi r\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p b\u1ea1n t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng Munich vào th\u1ee9 Ba t\u1edbi. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t nóng lòng xem các k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t cho phiên b\u1ea3n máy tính b\u1ea3ng m\u1edbi và g\u1ecdn nh\u1eb9<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Có m\u1ed9t tính n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a máy tính b\u1ea3ng mà tôi \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t hài lòng.<\/p>

W-Br: Th\u1eadt ch\u1ee9? Gì v\u1eady?<\/p>

M-Cn: M\u1eabu máy này có tu\u1ed5i th\u1ecd pin t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t t\u1eeb tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn nay. Bây gi\u1edd nó có th\u1ec3 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong ba ngày v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n s\u1ea1c.<\/p>

W-Br: Th\u1eadt không th\u1ec3 tin \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c - Tôi r\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nghe thêm v\u1ec1 tính n\u0103ng này trong bu\u1ed5i thuy\u1ebft trình. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, chúng tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 \u0103n t\u1ed1i cho b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a chúng ta vào t\u1ed1i hôm \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1ef1c ra, ca s\u0129 yêu thích c\u1ee7a tôi s\u1ebd bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n vào \u0111êm \u0111ó<\/p>

W-Br: Ok, không sao. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p b\u1ea1n s\u1edbm thôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Welcome to the Westfield Hotel! I'm the event coordinator, and this is my associate, Diane. So, you'd like to host an event here?

M-Au: Yes! I work for the National Journalists Association. We're planning our annual awards banquet for June-for about a hundred guests.

W-Br: Well, we have a beautiful ballroom on this floor that I can show you. It's been used for awards ceremonies before.

M-Au: Okay. Also, about half of our guests will be coming from out of town. Do you have enough rooms available for them to stay here?

W-Am: I'm sure we do, but we'll check and send you a quote for a group rate.

W-Br: And additionally, we do offer free shuttle service to and from the airport
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi khách s\u1ea1n Westfield! Tôi là ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n và \u0111ây là c\u1ed9ng s\u1ef1 c\u1ee7a tôi, Diane. B\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111úng không?<\/p>

M-Au: Vâng! Tôi làm vi\u1ec7c cho Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Nhà báo Qu\u1ed1c gia. Chúng tôi \u0111ang lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c ti\u1ec7c trao gi\u1ea3i hàng n\u0103m vào tháng 6 v\u1edbi kho\u1ea3ng m\u1ed9t tr\u0103m khách.<\/p>

W-Br: Chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n cho b\u1ea1n xem m\u1ed9t phòng khiêu v\u0169 tuy\u1ec7t \u0111\u1eb9p trên t\u1ea7ng. Nó \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho các l\u1ec5 trao gi\u1ea3i tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c. Ngoài ra, kho\u1ea3ng m\u1ed9t n\u1eeda s\u1ed1 khách c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb các thành ph\u1ed1 khác. B\u1ea1n có \u0111\u1ee7 phòng tr\u1ed1ng cho h\u1ecd \u1edf \u0111ây không?<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn là có, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi s\u1ebd ki\u1ec3m tra và báo cho b\u1ea1n m\u1ee9c giá nhóm.<\/p>

W-Br: Ngoài ra, chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón mi\u1ec5n phí \u0111i và \u0111\u1ebfn sân bay.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Excuse me. My mobile phone is out of power. Are there any tables here at the cafe that are near a wall socket, so I can charge my phone while I have some coffee?

W-Br: Well, we only have a few outlets. And... it looks like all the tables near them are occupied. I'm sorry about that.

M-Au: Hmm. In that case, can you suggest anywhere nearby where I might be able to sit for a few minutes and charge my phone, then?

W-Br: You know, the public library would be perfect for that, and it's just a block up the hill. You'll see it on the corner of Willow Street
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin l\u1ed7i. \u0110i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a tôi h\u1ebft pin r\u1ed3i. Quán cà phê này còn bàn g\u1ea7n \u1ed5 c\u1eafm \u0111\u1ec3 tôi có th\u1ec3 s\u1ea1c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i trong khi u\u1ed1ng cà phê không?<\/p>

W-Br: Chúng tôi ch\u1ec9 có m\u1ed9t vài bàn. Và ... có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các bàn g\u1ea7n \u1ed5 c\u1eafm \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111ã có ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Tôi xin l\u1ed7i v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Au: H\u1eebm. N\u1ebfu v\u1eady b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 g\u1ee3i ý b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 n\u01a1i nào g\u1ea7n \u0111ó mà tôi có th\u1ec3 ng\u1ed3i vài phút và s\u1ea1c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i không?<\/p>

W-Br: B\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft là th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n công c\u1ed9ng s\u1ebd là n\u01a1i hoàn h\u1ea3o cho vi\u1ec7c \u0111ó mà, và nó ch\u1ec9 là m\u1ed9t dãy nhà trên \u0111\u1ed3i. B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y nó \u1edf góc ph\u1ed1 Willow.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Mary? I'm working on the bill for one of Dr. Singh's patients, and I keep getting an error message for the code I'm using...

W-Am: Oh! The billing codes recently changed. You must be referring to the old list.

M-Cn: Do you have the updated one?

W-Am: Yes, right here. Which procedure is it?

M-Cn: A blood test

W-Am: All right ... Here's the code you should use.

M-Cn: Thanks! Could I get a copy of that list?

W-Am: Sure. But I heard they'll be adding the codes to our billing software soon, so we won't need to deal with paper lists anymore.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Mary? Tôi \u0111ang tính toán hóa \u0111\u01a1n cho m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng b\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a bác s\u0129 Singh và tôi ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông báo l\u1ed7i cho mã mà tôi \u0111ang s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ...<\/p>

W-Am: \u1ed2! Các mã thanh toán g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã thay \u0111\u1ed5i. Anh ph\u1ea3i tham kh\u1ea3o danh sách c\u0169.<\/p>

M-Cn: Cô có b\u1ea3n c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt không?<\/p>

W-Am: Vâng, ngay \u0111ây. Anh \u0111ang làm th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c nào?<\/p>

M-Cn: Xét nghi\u1ec7m máu<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i ... \u0110ây là mã anh nên s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Tôi có th\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee7a danh sách \u0111ó không?<\/p>

W-Am: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Nh\u01b0ng tôi nghe nói r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd s\u1ebd s\u1edbm thêm mã vào ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m thanh toán c\u1ee7a chúng ta, vì v\u1eady chúng ta s\u1ebd không c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i x\u1eed lý danh sách gi\u1ea5y n\u1eefa.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Pedro, there's a lot of interest in our new line of women's dresses planned for the spring. It looks like there will be a lot of demand, so we'd better increase production to be sure we have a supply of all garment sizes.

M-Au: In that case, I suggest we let the human resources department know that we'll need more workers.

W-Am: Right. I'll give them a call now.

M-Au: OK, great. And I was just working on the labels. In fact, the template for the label is up on my computer screen.

W-Am: Can I see? Oh, wait! These garments are 100 percent cotton; so they shouldn't be washed in warm water.

M-Au: OK. I'll make that change now
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Pedro, m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi r\u1ea5t quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn dòng váy n\u1eef m\u1edbi mà chúng ta \u0111ã lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch cho mùa xuân. Có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 nhu c\u1ea7u khá cao, vì v\u1eady chúng ta nên t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o có \u0111\u1ee7 ngu\u1ed3n cung cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các kích c\u1ee1 trang ph\u1ee5c.<\/p>

M-Au: N\u1ebfu v\u1eady, tôi \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb chúng ta nên cho b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn nhân s\u1ef1 bi\u1ebft chúng ta s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n thêm nhân công.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110úng v\u1eady. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1ecdi cho h\u1ecd ngay bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>

M-Au: OK, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. Và tôi ch\u1ec9 làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1ec1 nhãn mác. Th\u1ef1c ra, máy tính tôi \u0111ã có các m\u1eabu nhãn mác r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi có th\u1ec3 xem \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? \u1ed2, ch\u1edd \u0111ã! Nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m may m\u1eb7c này là 100% cotton; vì v\u1eady chúng không nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1eeda b\u1eb1ng n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1ea5m.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi s\u1ebd s\u1eeda nó luôn \u0111ây.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Mr. Foster. This is Kasumi Ito, the hiring manager at Silverby Industries. We've reviewed your job application and would like you to come in for an interview. Are you available Tuesday at 2 P.M. next week?

M-Cn: Thanks for getting back to me. Let me check my calendar... Yes, I can do that.

W-Br: Good. Now, Silverby Industries is in a business complex. 0ur building is on Tinley Avenue, and we're right next to the lake.

M-Cn: Thanks. And am I able to park anywhere, or will I need a permit?

W-Br: Just make sure you're in a space marked Visitor, and you won't get a parking violation.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào Foster. Tôi là Kasumi Ito, giám \u0111\u1ed1c tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng t\u1ea1i Silverby Industries. Chúng tôi \u0111ã xem xét \u0111\u01a1n xin vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và mu\u1ed1n b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n. Lúc 2 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u Th\u1ee9 Ba tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi b\u1ea1n có r\u1ea3nh không?<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã liên l\u1ea1c l\u1ea1i v\u1edbi tôi. \u0110\u1ee3i tôi ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ecbch m\u1ed9t chút ... Vâng, tôi có th\u1ec3 t\u1edbi ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n.<\/p>

W-Br: T\u1ed1t. Bây gi\u1edd, Silverby Industries \u0111ang \u1edf trong m\u1ed9t khu ph\u1ee9c h\u1ee3p kinh doanh. Tòa nhà c\u1ee7a chúng tôi n\u1eb1m trên \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Tinley, và công ty chúng tôi \u1edf ngay c\u1ea1nh h\u1ed3.<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông. Và tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eadu xe \u1edf b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 \u0111âu, hay tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n gi\u1ea5y phép?<\/p>

W-Br: Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n \u0111ang \u1edf trong m\u1ed9t không gian \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u là dành cho Khách và b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không b\u1ecb vi ph\u1ea1m ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1ed7 xe.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
Attention all listeners! Palmer's Gym now has several locations in your area. We have everything you need to keep fit, including exercise classes and fitness instructors ready to help you! But that's not all. Starting in April, your membership gives you access to any of our locations across the country. So if you're traveling for business or just on vacation, you won't have to skip your workout routine! Visit our Web site to see a map of all the Palmer's Gym locations across the nation!

Dịch: Tất cả các thính giả chú ý! Phòng tập thể dục của Palmer hiện có một số địa điểm phòng tập trong khu bạn sống. Chúng tôi có mọi thứ bạn cần để giữ dáng, bao gồm các lớp tập thể dục và huấn luyện viên thể dục sẵn sàng giúp bạn! Nhưng đó không phải là tất cả. Bắt đầu từ tháng 4, với tư cách thành viên, bạn có thể vào bất kỳ phòng tập nào của chúng tôi trên toàn quốc. Vì vậy, nếu bạn đang đi công tác hoặc chỉ đi nghỉ, bạn sẽ không phải bỏ lỡ một buổi tập nào! Hãy truy cập trang web của chúng tôi để xem bản đồ tất cả các địa điểm Phòng tập thể dục của Palmer trên toàn quốc!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các thính gi\u1ea3 chú ý! Phòng t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a Palmer hi\u1ec7n có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m phòng t\u1eadp trong khu b\u1ea1n s\u1ed1ng. Chúng tôi có m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 b\u1ea1n c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1eef dáng, bao g\u1ed3m các l\u1edbp t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c và hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n viên th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c s\u1eb5n sàng giúp b\u1ea1n! Nh\u01b0ng \u0111ó không ph\u1ea3i là t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3. B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb tháng 4, v\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách thành viên, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 vào b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 phòng t\u1eadp nào c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trên toàn qu\u1ed1c. Vì v\u1eady, n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111ang \u0111i công tác ho\u1eb7c ch\u1ec9 \u0111i ngh\u1ec9, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không ph\u1ea3i b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i t\u1eadp nào! Hãy truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 xem b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m Phòng t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a Palmer trên toàn qu\u1ed1c!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Before we end this meeting, I want to thank everyone for the extra hours you've put in getting our new line of camera accessories ready for market. Because of your willingness to work overtime, the new products will be ready in time for the trade show coming up next month in Shanghai. That's in addition to the accessories we usually display, but it shouldn't be a problem. We've reserved a booth at the front of the exhibition hall this year, and it's a large space.

Dịch: W-Br: Trước khi chúng ta kết thúc cuộc họp này, tôi muốn cảm ơn mọi người vì đã dành thêm thời gian để chuẩn bị sẵn sàng đưa dòng phụ kiện máy ảnh mới của chúng ta ra thị trường. Vì sự nhiệt tình làm thêm giờ của bạn, các sản phẩm mới sẽ kịp ra mắt ở triển lãm thương mại diễn ra vào tháng tới tại Thượng Hải. Dù có nhiều phụ kiện hơn bình thường vẫn trưng bày, nhưng nó không phải là vấn đề. Chúng ta đã đặt một gian hàng ở phía trước của phòng triển lãm năm nay, và không gian của nó khá là lớn.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng ta k\u1ebft thúc cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp này, tôi mu\u1ed1n c\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi vì \u0111ã dành thêm th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u01b0a dòng ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n máy \u1ea3nh m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a chúng ta ra th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Vì s\u1ef1 nhi\u1ec7t tình làm thêm gi\u1edd c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi s\u1ebd k\u1ecbp ra m\u1eaft \u1edf tri\u1ec3n lãm th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i di\u1ec5n ra vào tháng t\u1edbi t\u1ea1i Th\u01b0\u1ee3ng H\u1ea3i. Dù có nhi\u1ec1u ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n h\u01a1n bình th\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1eabn tr\u01b0ng bày, nh\u01b0ng nó không ph\u1ea3i là v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Chúng ta \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t gian hàng \u1edf phía tr\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a phòng tri\u1ec3n lãm n\u0103m nay, và không gian c\u1ee7a nó khá là l\u1edbn.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Good evening. My name's Mateo and I'll be serving you tonight. Since this is your first time here, let me tell you about our restaurant. AII the vegetable products you see on the menu come from our very own vegetable garden. The owner of the cafe, Natasha, is a talented gardener who grows our fresh produce herself. Now, tonight we have a special entree. It's poached salmon, caught fresh today. It's a simple dish, served with a lemon sauce and a salad. I eat it all the time. So, while you read over the menu, can I bring you a beverage?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i. Tên tôi là Mateo và tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 b\u1ea1n t\u1ed1i nay. Vì \u0111ây là l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây, hãy \u0111\u1ec3 tôi k\u1ec3 cho b\u1ea1n nghe v\u1ec1 nhà hàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m rau b\u1ea1n th\u1ea5y trên th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb chính v\u01b0\u1eddn rau c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Ch\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a quán cà phê, cô Natasha, là m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi làm v\u01b0\u1eddn tài n\u0103ng, cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã t\u1ef1 tay tr\u1ed3ng các lo\u1ea1i rau c\u1ee7. T\u1ed1i nay chúng ta có m\u1ed9t món chính\u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t. \u0110ó là cá h\u1ed3i lu\u1ed9c, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1eaft t\u01b0\u01a1i hôm nay. \u0110ây là m\u1ed9t món \u0103n \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 v\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ed1t chanh và salad. Lúc nào tôi c\u0169ng \u0103n nó. Trong khi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ecdc qua th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n, tôi s\u1ebd mang cho b\u1ea1n chút \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng nhé?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: so welcome aboard this morning's direct flight to Toronto. We look forward to flying with you today. Unfortunately, we've run out of space in the overhead bins for larger carry-on bags. If your bag won't fit under your seat, we'll take it from you and check it. You'll be able to pick it up at the baggage claim when we land. In addition, we have several meal options for purchase today. Our standard selections are listed in the magazine in the seat pocket in front of you. If you would like to purchase a meal, please notify a flight attendant.

Dịch: M-Au: Chào mừng bạn đã lên chuyến bay đến Toronto vào sáng nay. Chúng tôi rất hân hạnh được đồng hành cùng bạn ngày hôm nay. Thật không may, chúng tôi đã hết chỗ trong các khoang phía trên cho các hành lý xách tay lớn. Nếu chỗ bạn không để vừa túi, chúng tôi sẽ làm thủ tục gửi đồ giúp bạn. Bạn sẽ có thể nhận nó tại khu vực lấy hành lý khi chúng tôi hạ cánh. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi có một số lựa chọn bữa ăn cho hôm nay. Các lựa chọn tiêu chuẩn của chúng tôi được liệt kê trong cuốn tạp chí ở túi ghế trước mặt bạn. Nếu bạn muốn đặt một bữa ăn, vui lòng thông báo cho tiếp viên hàng không.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111ã lên chuy\u1ebfn bay \u0111\u1ebfn Toronto vào sáng nay. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t hân h\u1ea1nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed3ng hành cùng b\u1ea1n ngày hôm nay. Th\u1eadt không may, chúng tôi \u0111ã h\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 trong các khoang phía trên cho các hành lý xách tay l\u1edbn. N\u1ebfu ch\u1ed7 b\u1ea1n không \u0111\u1ec3 v\u1eeba túi, chúng tôi s\u1ebd làm th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ed3 giúp b\u1ea1n. B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn nó t\u1ea1i khu v\u1ef1c l\u1ea5y hành lý khi chúng tôi h\u1ea1 cánh. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn b\u1eefa \u0103n cho hôm nay. Các l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn tiêu chu\u1ea9n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê trong cu\u1ed1n t\u1ea1p chí \u1edf túi gh\u1ebf tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1eb7t b\u1ea1n. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa \u0103n, vui lòng thông báo cho ti\u1ebfp viên hàng không.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hello. It's Dana, one of your truck drivers. I'm supposed to deliver kitchen appliances to our store branches in Syracuse. I'm looking for one of the branches, and according to the list I was given, there should be a store at 33 Thistle Lane. Well, I've driven up and down the whole road, and all I see are houses. I'll deliver the appliances to the other stores on my list, but while I'm doing that, could you please get back to me with the correct address?

Dịch: W-Am: Xin chào. Tôi là Dana, một trong những tài xế xe tải của bạn. Tôi nhận nhiệm vụ giao các thiết bị nhà bếp cho các chi nhánh cửa hàng của chúng ta ở Syracuse. Tôi đang tìm một trong các chi nhánh, và theo danh sách mà tôi được đưa, chắc hẳn có một cửa hàng ở 33 Thistle Lane. Tôi đã lái xe khắp cả con đường, và tôi chỉ thấy toàn những ngôi nhà thôi. Tôi sẽ giao các thiết bị đến các cửa hàng khác trong danh sách, nhưng trong khi đó, bạn có thể vui lòng cho tôi địa chỉ chính xác được không?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào. Tôi là Dana, m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng tài x\u1ebf xe t\u1ea3i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Tôi nh\u1eadn nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 giao các thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb nhà b\u1ebfp cho các chi nhánh c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u1edf Syracuse. Tôi \u0111ang tìm m\u1ed9t trong các chi nhánh, và theo danh sách mà tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01b0a, ch\u1eafc h\u1eb3n có m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng \u1edf 33 Thistle Lane. Tôi \u0111ã lái xe kh\u1eafp c\u1ea3 con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng, và tôi ch\u1ec9 th\u1ea5y toàn nh\u1eefng ngôi nhà thôi. Tôi s\u1ebd giao các thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ebfn các c\u1eeda hàng khác trong danh sách, nh\u01b0ng trong khi \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 vui lòng cho tôi \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 chính xác \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Good afternoon. My name is Lawrence Wilson, and I'll be conducting the training on how to use our company's new scheduling software - Spark Schedule. The reason we chose this particular software is because it makes it easy for you to schedule meetings with people in different time zones. That way we can conduct business with our increasing number of clients all over the world. And best of all, there's a mobile phone application that you can download for free. This will allow you to check your schedule from any location.

Dịch: M-Cn: Chào buổi chiều. Tôi là Lawrence Wilson và tôi sẽ tiến hành đào tạo về cách sử dụng phần mềm lập lịch trình mới của công ty chúng tôi - Spark Schedule. Lý do chúng tôi chọn phần mềm đặc biệt này là vì nó giúp bạn dễ dàng lên lịch họp với những người ở các múi giờ khác nhau. Bằng cách đó, chúng tôi có thể tiến hành hoạt động kinh doanh với số lượng khách hàng ngày càng tăng trên toàn thế giới. Điều tuyệt nhất là ứng dụng đã có sẵn và miễn phí tải về trên điện thoại thông minh. Do vậy bạn có thể kiểm tra lịch trình của mình dù ở bất cứ nơi đâu.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u. Tôi là Lawrence Wilson và tôi s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn hành \u0111ào t\u1ea1o v\u1ec1 cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m l\u1eadp l\u1ecbch trình m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a công ty chúng tôi - Spark Schedule. Lý do chúng tôi ch\u1ecdn ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này là vì nó giúp b\u1ea1n d\u1ec5 dàng lên l\u1ecbch h\u1ecdp v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u1edf các múi gi\u1edd khác nhau. B\u1eb1ng cách \u0111ó, chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfn hành ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh v\u1edbi s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng khách hàng ngày càng t\u0103ng trên toàn th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. \u0110i\u1ec1u tuy\u1ec7t nh\u1ea5t là \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng \u0111ã có s\u1eb5n và mi\u1ec5n phí t\u1ea3i v\u1ec1 trên \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i thông minh. Do v\u1eady b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ecbch trình c\u1ee7a mình dù \u1edf b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 n\u01a1i \u0111âu.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Th\u00f4ng tin: ...and I'll be conducting training on how to use our company's new scheduling software - Spark Schedule. (...v\u00e0 t\u00f4i s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn h\u00e0nh \u0111\u00e0o t\u1ea1o v\u1ec1 c\u00e1ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m l\u1eadp l\u1ecbch tr\u00ecnh m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a c\u00f4ng ty ch\u00fang t\u00f4i - Spark Schedule.)"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Th\u00f4ng tin: The reason we chose this particular software is because it makes it easy to schedule meetings with people in different time zones. (L\u00fd do ch\u00fang t\u00f4i ch\u1ecdn ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t n\u00e0y l\u00e0 v\u00ec n\u00f3 gi\u00fap b\u1ea1n d\u1ec5 d\u00e0ng l\u00ean l\u1ecbch h\u1ecdp v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u1edf c\u00e1c m\u00fai gi\u1edd kh\u00e1c nhau.)"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker say is offered with the product?
childrens.answers: ["A. An annual upgrade","B. A money-back guarantee","C. A mobile phone application","D. A customer-service help line"]
childrens.explains: {"vn":"Th\u00f4ng tin: The best part is that the app is available and free to download on smartphones. (\u0110i\u1ec1u tuy\u1ec7t nh\u1ea5t l\u00e0 \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u00e3 c\u00f3 s\u1eb5n v\u00e0 mi\u1ec5n ph\u00ed t\u1ea3i v\u1ec1 tr\u00ean \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i th\u00f4ng minh.)"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: This is Guo Lin with KDM TV News. Tonight, there's news about the Ashworth City light-rail. Work continues on this massive construction project, but the announcement of new federal safety regulations means that major modifications must be made to the tracks. Opening day could be delayed by as much as three months. Public opinion about the railway is already divided. Some residents say they don't approve of how much money is being spent on the project, but others say it's worth the cost. I'm here at the Fourth Street station where I'll ask a few passersby how they feel about this latest development in the project.

Dịch: W-Br: Tôi là Guo Lin của KDM TV News. Tối nay sẽ là tin tức về đường sắt đô thị nhẹ ở Thành phố Ashworth. Dự án xây dựng này vẫn tiếp tục được tiến hành, nhưng việc công bố các quy định an toàn mới của liên bang đồng nghĩa với việc phải thực hiện khá nhiều sửa đổi đối với đường ray. Ngày khai trương có thể bị trì hoãn đến ba tháng. Dư luận về đường sắt vốn đã chia rẽ. Một số cư dân nói rằng họ không tán thành việc chi quá nhiều tiền vào dự án, nhưng những người khác nói rằng nó xứng đáng với chi phí bỏ ra. Tôi đang ở nhà ga Fourth Street và tôi sẽ hỏi một vài người qua đường cảm nhận của họ về những diễn biến mới nhất của dự án.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Tôi là Guo Lin c\u1ee7a KDM TV News. T\u1ed1i nay s\u1ebd là tin t\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1eaft \u0111ô th\u1ecb nh\u1eb9 \u1edf Thành ph\u1ed1 Ashworth. D\u1ef1 án xây d\u1ef1ng này v\u1eabn ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn hành, nh\u01b0ng vi\u1ec7c công b\u1ed1 các quy \u0111\u1ecbnh an toàn m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a liên bang \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u0129a v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c ph\u1ea3i th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n khá nhi\u1ec1u s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ray. Ngày khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng có th\u1ec3 b\u1ecb trì hoãn \u0111\u1ebfn ba tháng. D\u01b0 lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1eaft v\u1ed1n \u0111ã chia r\u1ebd. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 c\u01b0 dân nói r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd không tán thành vi\u1ec7c chi quá nhi\u1ec1u ti\u1ec1n vào d\u1ef1 án, nh\u01b0ng nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác nói r\u1eb1ng nó x\u1ee9ng \u0111áng v\u1edbi chi phí b\u1ecf ra. Tôi \u0111ang \u1edf nhà ga Fourth Street và tôi s\u1ebd h\u1ecfi m\u1ed9t vài ng\u01b0\u1eddi qua \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng di\u1ec5n bi\u1ebfn m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 án.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: First of all, we know you have a busy schedule outside of work, so thanks for coming into the warehouse today to work on a Saturday. OK, so we're here because this extra shipment was delivered yesterday. There are hundreds of boxes, and we have to check what's inside them and put the information into our warehouse database. Now, I'm going to assign you all to groups. Once you have your group number, go ahead and join your group members. Group leaders will tell you which boxes you'll be working on
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Tr\u01b0\u1edbc h\u1ebft, chúng tôi bi\u1ebft ngoài công vi\u1ec7c ra thì các b\u1ea1n r\u1ea5t b\u1eadn, vì v\u1eady c\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn kho làm vi\u1ec7c vào th\u1ee9 B\u1ea3y. OK, hôm nay chúng ta ph\u1ea3i \u1edf \u0111ây vì hôm qua lô hàng b\u1ed5 sung \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao. Có hàng tr\u0103m h\u1ed9p, chúng ta ph\u1ea3i ki\u1ec3m tra bên trong và nh\u1eadp thông tin vào c\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u kho. Bây gi\u1edd, tôi s\u1ebd phân công các b\u1ea1n vào các nhóm. Sau khi b\u1ea1n có s\u1ed1 nhóm c\u1ee7a mình, hãy ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c tham gia cùng các thành viên trong nhóm. Tr\u01b0\u1edfng nhóm s\u1ebd cho các b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft mình s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi h\u1ed9p nào.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: And now, an event we've all been waiting for since last year - Danville's Annual Cook-Off. Held outside at City Park, the Cook-Off always attracts a lot of participants. Competitors prepare one dish, which they serve throughout the day. A panel of judges w ill select the winners based on taste, presentation, and uniqueness. This event is great fun for the whole family, and entry and food samples are free! If you're interested in participating, the contest registration form is available on the city's Web site. Now, keep in mind we're expecting a cloudy day for this year's event. We won't see any sunshine, so be sure to bring a jacket!

Dịch: W-Am: Và bây giờ là sự kiện mà tất cả chúng ta đã chờ đợi từ năm ngoái - Sự kiện Cook-Off hàng năm của Danville được tổ chức ngoài trời tại City Park, Cook-Off luôn thu hút rất đông người tham gia. Người dự thi chuẩn bị một món ăn cho cả ngày. Ban giám khảo sẽ chọn người chiến thắng dựa trên hương vị, cách trình bày và tính độc đáo. Sự kiện này là sân chơi cho mọi nhà, và toàn bộ các mẫu thức ăn và vé vào cửa đều miễn phí! Nếu bạn muốn tham gia, lên Web của thành phố và điền mẫu đăng kí cuộc thi. Bây giờ, nhớ rằng ngày hôm đó chắc sẽ khá nhiều mây. Chúng ta sẽ không nhìn thấy bất kỳ ánh nắng mặt trời nào, vì vậy hãy nhớ mang theo áo khoác!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Và bây gi\u1edd là s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n mà t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta \u0111ã ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i t\u1eeb n\u0103m ngoái - S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n Cook-Off hàng n\u0103m c\u1ee7a Danville \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c ngoài tr\u1eddi t\u1ea1i City Park, Cook-Off luôn thu hút r\u1ea5t \u0111ông ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi d\u1ef1 thi chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb m\u1ed9t món \u0103n cho c\u1ea3 ngày. Ban giám kh\u1ea3o s\u1ebd ch\u1ecdn ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng d\u1ef1a trên h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb, cách trình bày và tính \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo. S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này là sân ch\u01a1i cho m\u1ecdi nhà, và toàn b\u1ed9 các m\u1eabu th\u1ee9c \u0103n và vé vào c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec1u mi\u1ec5n phí! N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n tham gia, lên Web c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 và \u0111i\u1ec1n m\u1eabu \u0111\u0103ng kí cu\u1ed9c thi. Bây gi\u1edd, nh\u1edb r\u1eb1ng ngày hôm \u0111ó ch\u1eafc s\u1ebd khá nhi\u1ec1u mây. Chúng ta s\u1ebd không nhìn th\u1ea5y b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ánh n\u1eafng m\u1eb7t tr\u1eddi nào, vì v\u1eady hãy nh\u1edb mang theo áo khoác!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: This is Seung-ho Park from Park Investors. We met last month at the Westside Technology Conference. I attended your interesting presentation and spoke to you afterward about my small investment firm. I'm calling because I'd like to hire you to discuss ways to make my company's database more secure. I know you specialize in this type of work, and I'm hoping you'll be interested in this project. Could you please e-mail me a list of your consultant fees? Use the e-mail address on the business card I gave you. Thanks.

Dịch: M-Cn: Tôi là Seung-ho Park của Park Investors. Chúng ta đã gặp nhau vào tháng trước tại Hội nghị Công nghệ Westside. Tôi đã tham dự buổi thuyết trình thú vị của anh và sau đó đã nói chuyện với anh về công ty có đầu tư nhỏ của tôi. Tôi gọi vì tôi mong muốn hợp tác thảo luận với anh về bảo mật cho cơ sở dữ liệu của công ty tôi an toàn hơn. Tôi biết anh là chuyên gia trong lĩnh vực này, và tôi hy vọng anh sẽ quan tâm đến dự án này. Anh vui lòng e-mail cho tôi danh sách phí tư vấn của anh được không? Anh có thể gửi qua địa chỉ e-mail trên danh thiếp tôi đã đưa cho anh. Cảm ơn anh.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Tôi là Seung-ho Park c\u1ee7a Park Investors. Chúng ta \u0111ã g\u1eb7p nhau vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb Công ngh\u1ec7 Westside. Tôi \u0111ã tham d\u1ef1 bu\u1ed5i thuy\u1ebft trình thú v\u1ecb c\u1ee7a anh và sau \u0111ó \u0111ã nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi anh v\u1ec1 công ty có \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 nh\u1ecf c\u1ee7a tôi. Tôi g\u1ecdi vì tôi mong mu\u1ed1n h\u1ee3p tác th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1edbi anh v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt cho c\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a công ty tôi an toàn h\u01a1n. Tôi bi\u1ebft anh là chuyên gia trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c này, và tôi hy v\u1ecdng anh s\u1ebd quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn d\u1ef1 án này. Anh vui lòng e-mail cho tôi danh sách phí t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n c\u1ee7a anh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: Ms. Durkin asked for volunteers to help ____ with the employee fitness program
childrens.answers: ["she","her","hers","herself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Durkin asked for volunteers to help her with the employee fitness program.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Cô Durkin \u0111ã nh\u1edd các tình nguy\u1ec7n viên giúp cô trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c cho nhân viên.<\/p>

A. She - Làm ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef<\/p>

B. Her: Làm tân ng\u1eef ho\u1eb7c tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu (c\u1ea7n danh t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ee9ng sau)<\/p>

C. Hers: \u0110\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu "c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y", không c\u1ea7n danh t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ee9ng sau<\/p>

D. Herself: \u0110\u1ea1i t\u1eeb ph\u1ea3n thân "t\u1ef1 cô \u1ea5y"<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: T\u1eeb c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n \u0111\u1ee9ng sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb "help" và gi\u1eef v\u1ecb trí tân ng\u1eef trong câu<\/p>


<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Durkin asked for volunteers to help her with the employee fitness program.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. She: Subject<\/p>

B. Her: Object or Possessive Adjective (+N)<\/p>

C. Hers: Possessive Pronoun<\/p>

D. Herself: Reflexive Pronoun<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Help (V) + her (O)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Lasner Electronics' staff have extensive ____ of current hardware systems
childrens.answers: ["know","known","knowledge","knowledgeable"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lasner Electronics' staff have extensive knowledge of current hardware systems.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Nhân viên c\u1ee7a Lasner Electronics có ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c sâu r\u1ed9ng v\u1ec1 các h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee9ng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i.<\/p>

A. Know: Bi\u1ebft (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. Known: Bi\u1ebft (phân t\u1eeb c\u1ee7a "know")<\/p>

C. Knowledge: Ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. Knowledgeable: Am hi\u1ec3u (Tính t\u1eeb) <\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Extensive (tính t\u1eeb) + Knowledge (danh t\u1eeb) => C\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb<\/p>","en":"

Lasner Electronics' staff have extensive knowledge of current hardware systems.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Know: Verb<\/p>

B. Known: Past Participle<\/p>

C. Knowledge: Noun<\/p>

D. Knowledgeable: Adjective<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Extensive (Adj) + Knowledge (N) => Noun Phrase<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ a year, Tarrin Industrial Supply aud its the accounts of all of its factories
childrens.answers: ["Once","Immediately","Directly","Yet"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Once a year, Tarrin Industrial Supply audits the accounts of all of its factories<\/p>

###<\/p>

M\u1ed7i n\u0103m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n, Tarrin Industrial Supply th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n ki\u1ec3m toán \u1edf t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các nhà máy.<\/p>

A. Once: M\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n<\/p>

B. Immediately: Ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c<\/p>

C. Directly: M\u1ed9t cách tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp<\/p>

D. Yet: Nh\u01b0ng<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Once a year: M\u1ed7i n\u0103m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n, các t\u1eeb còn l\u1ea1i th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ee9ng m\u1ed9t mình, không phù h\u1ee3p khi \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc \"a year\"<\/p>","en":"

Once a year, Tarrin Industrial Supply audits the accounts of all of its factories<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Once + time (month, year...)<\/p>

B. Immediately: without delay<\/p>

C. Directly<\/p>

D. Yet = but<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: \"Once a year\" makes sense, the others can stand alone.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Pham requested a refund ____ the coffeemaker she received was damaged
childrens.answers: ["despite","why","concerning","because"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Pham requested a refund because the coffeemaker she received was damaged<\/p>

###<\/p>

Cô Ph\u1ea1m \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u hoàn l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n vì chi\u1ebfc máy pha cà phê mà cô nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng<\/p>

A. despite: m\u1eb7c dù (+ Ving\/N)<\/p>

B. why: t\u1ea1i sao <\/p>

C. concerning: liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn (+N)<\/p>

D. because: vì (+clause)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: "Because" là t\u1eeb n\u1ed1i dùng \u0111\u1ec3 liên k\u1ebft 2 m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 quan h\u1ec7 nguyên nhân-k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 trong câu: <\/p>

M\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 1: Ms. Pham requested a refund<\/p>

M\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 2: the coffeemaker she received was damaged<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Pham requested a refund because the coffeemaker she received was damaged<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. despite + Ving\/N<\/p>

B. why: used in the question to ask<\/p>

C. concerning +N<\/p>

D. because +clause<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: "Because" is the conjunction to connect cause-effect clauses<\/p>

Clause 1: Ms. Pham requested a refund<\/p>

Clause 2: the coffeemaker she received was damaged<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Information ____ the artwork in the lobby is available at the reception desk
childrens.answers: ["across","about","upon","except"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Information about the artwork in the lobby is available at the reception desk<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin v\u1ec1 các tác ph\u1ea9m ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt t\u1ea1i s\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ee3i có t\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y l\u1ec5 tân<\/p>

A. across: b\u0103ng qua<\/p>

B. about: v\u1ec1<\/p>

C. upon: trên<\/p>

D. except: ngo\u1ea1i tr\u1eeb<\/p>","en":"

Information about the artwork in the lobby is available at the reception desk<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. across<\/p>

B. about <\/p>

C. upon<\/p>

D. except<\/p>"}

childrens.title: With the Gema XTI binoculars, users can ____ see objects that are more than 100 meters away
childrens.answers: ["ease","easy","easily","easier"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

With the Gema XTI binoculars, users can easily see objects that are more than 100 meters away<\/p>

###<\/p>

V\u1edbi \u1ed1ng nhòm Gema XTI, ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng có th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 dàng nhìn th\u1ea5y các v\u1eadt th\u1ec3 cách xa h\u01a1n 100 mét<\/p>

A. ease: s\u1ef1 d\u1ec5 dàng (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. easy: d\u1ec5 dàng (tính t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. easily: m\u1ed9t cách d\u1ec5 dàng (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. easier: d\u1ec5 h\u01a1n (so sánh c\u1ee7a tính t\u1eeb) (tobe + easier)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Users (Danh t\u1eeb) + can + easily (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb) + see (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>","en":"

With the Gema XTI binoculars, users can easily see objects that are more than 100 meters away<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. ease: Noun<\/p>

B. easy: Adj<\/p>

C. easily: Adv<\/p>

D. easier: Comparative form <\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Users (N) + can + easily (Adv) + see (V)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The Physical Therapy Association is committed to keeping costs ____ for its certification programs
childrens.answers: ["affordable","permitted","cutting","necessary"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The Physical Therapy Association is committed to keeping costs affordable for its certification programs<\/p>

###<\/p>

Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i V\u1eadt lý tr\u1ecb li\u1ec7u cam k\u1ebft gi\u1eef chi phí h\u1ee3p lý cho các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình có ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

A. affordable: giá c\u1ea3 h\u1ee3p lý<\/p>

B. permitted: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép<\/p>

C. cutting: c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m<\/p>

D. necessary: c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Keep cost affordable: gi\u1eef chi phí h\u1ee3p lý<\/p>","en":"

The Physical Therapy Association is committed to keeping costs affordable for its certification programs<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. affordable: cheap enough that people can afford to pay it or buy it<\/p>

B. permitted = allowed<\/p>

C. cutting<\/p>

D. necessary: essential, vital<\/p>


<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Brennel ____ positions in various areas of the company before he became president
childrens.answers: ["occupation","occupational","occupying","occupied"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Mr. Brennel occupied positions in various areas of the company before he became president<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ông Brennel \u0111ã n\u1eafm gi\u1eef các v\u1ecb trí trong nhi\u1ec1u l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c khác nhau c\u1ee7a công ty tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tr\u1edf thành ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch<\/p>

A. Occupation: ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p\/ s\u1ef1 chi\u1ebfm gi\u1eef (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. Occupational: thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p (tính t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. Occupying: Chi\u1ebfm gi\u1eef (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thêm "ing")<\/p>

D. Occupied: \u0111ã chi\u1ebfm gi\u1eef (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chia thì quá kh\u1ee9 \u0111\u01a1n)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Mr. Brennel (ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef) +  occupied (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb) +  positions in various areas (tân ng\u1eef)<\/p>","en":"

Mr. Brennel occupied positions in various areas of the company before he became president<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Occupation: Noun<\/p>

B. Occupational: Adj<\/p>

C. Occupying: Ving<\/p>

D. Occupied: V (simple past)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Mr. Brennel (S) +  occupied (V) +  positions in various areas (O)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: To remain on schedule, editors must submit all ____ to the book to the authors by Friday
childrens.answers: ["ideas","essays","revisions","suggestions"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

To remain on schedule, editors must submit all revisions to the book to the authors by Friday<\/p>

###<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 duy trì \u0111úng l\u1ecbch trình, các biên t\u1eadp viên ph\u1ea3i g\u1eedi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea3n ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda c\u1ee7a cu\u1ed1n sách cho các tác gi\u1ea3 tr\u01b0\u1edbc th\u1ee9 Sáu<\/p>

A. Ideas (for\/about\/of sth): Ý ki\u1ebfn cho <\/p>

B. Essays (about\/on sth): Bài lu\u1eadn, bài v\u0103n v\u1ec1<\/p>

C. Revisions (to sht): b\u1ea3n ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda cái gì \u0111ó<\/p>

D. Suggestions (on\/about sth): g\u1ee3i ý \u0111i\u1ec1u gì<\/p>

 <\/p>

 <\/p>","en":"

To remain on schedule, editors must submit all revisions to the book to the authors by Friday<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Ideas (of\/about\/for sth): a plan or thought, especially about what to do in a particular situation<\/p>

B. Essays (on\/about sth):  a short piece of writing by a student as part of a course of study<\/p>

C. Revisions (to sth): a change or set of changes to something<\/span><\/p>

D. Suggestions (on\/about sth): an idea or a plan that you mention for somebody else to think about<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ industry professionals are allowed to purchase tickets to the Kuo Photography Fair
childrens.answers: ["Only","Until","Unless","Quite"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Only industry professionals are allowed to purchase tickets to the Kuo Photography Fair<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ch\u1ec9 các chuyên gia trong ngành m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép mua vé tham d\u1ef1 H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh Kuo<\/p>

A. Only: ch\u1ec9<\/p>

B. Untill: cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi<\/p>

C. Unless: tr\u1eeb khi<\/p>

D. Quite: khá là<\/p>

 <\/p>","en":"

Only industry professionals are allowed to purchase tickets to the Kuo Photography Fair<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. only<\/p>

B. until<\/p>

C. unless<\/p>

D. quite<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At Pharmbeck's banquet, Mr. Jones ____ a trophy for his performance in this year's quality-improvement initiative
childrens.answers: ["accepted","congratulated","nominated","hoped"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

At Pharmbeck's banquet, Mr. Jones accepted a trophy for his performance in this year's quality-improvement initiative<\/p>

###<\/p>

T\u1ea1i b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a Pharmbeck, ông Jones \u0111ã nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc cúp cho thành tích c\u1ee7a mình trong sáng ki\u1ebfn c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng n\u0103m nay<\/p>

A. accepted: nh\u1eadn<\/p>

B. congratulated: chúc m\u1eebng<\/p>

C. nominated: \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eed<\/p>

D. hoped: hi v\u1ecdng<\/p>","en":"

At Pharmbeck's banquet, Mr. Jones accepted a trophy for his performance in this year's quality-improvement initiative<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. accepted: to take willingly something that is offered<\/p>

B. congratulated: to tell somebody that you are pleased about their success or achievements<\/p>

C. nominated: to formally suggest that somebody\/something should be chosen for an important role, prize, position<\/p>

D. hoped:  to want something to happen and think that it is possible<\/span><\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Suto claims that important market trends become ____ with the use of data analysis
childrens.answers: ["predict","prediction","predictable","predictably"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Suto claims that important market trends become predictable with the use of data analysis<\/p>

###<\/p>

Bà Suto tuyên b\u1ed1 r\u1eb1ng các xu h\u01b0\u1edbng th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng quan tr\u1ecdng tr\u1edf nên có th\u1ec3 d\u1ef1 \u0111oán \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng phân tích d\u1eef li\u1ec7u<\/p>

A. predict: d\u1ef1 \u0111oán (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. prediction: s\u1ef1 d\u1ef1 \u0111oán (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. predictable: có th\u1ec3 d\u1ef1 \u0111oán \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c (tính t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. predictably: có th\u1ec3 d\u1ef1 \u0111oán \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: become + tính t\u1eeb<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Suto claims that important market trends become predictable with the use of data analysis<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. predict: Verb<\/p>

B. prediction: Noun<\/p>

C. predictable: Adj<\/p>

D. predictably: Adv<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: become + Adj<\/p>"}

childrens.title: One of Grommer Consulting's goals is to enhance the relationship ____ salespeople and their customers

childrens.explains:

One of Groomer Consulting's goals is to enhance the relationship between salespeople and their customers<\/p>

###<\/p>

M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng m\u1ee5c tiêu c\u1ee7a Groomer Consulting là \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 gi\u1eefa nhân viên bán hàng và khách hàng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd<\/p>

A. inside: bên trong<\/p>

B. within: v\u1edbi, <\/p>

C. around: xung quanh<\/p>

D. between: gi\u1eefa<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: relationship between A and B: m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 gi\u1eefa A và B<\/p>","en":"

One of Groomer Consulting's goals is to enhance the relationship between salespeople and their customers<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. inside<\/p>

B. within<\/p>

C. around<\/p>

D. between<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanationon: relationship between A and B<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Depending on your answers to the survey, we ____ you to collect additional information
childrens.answers: ["may call","are calling","have been called","must be calling"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Depending on your answers to the survey, we may call you to collect additional information<\/p>

###<\/p>

Tùy thu\u1ed9c vào câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n cho cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát, chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi cho b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 thu th\u1eadp thông tin b\u1ed5 sung<\/p>

A. may call: có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi<\/p>

B. are calling: \u0111ang g\u1ecdi<\/p>

C. have been called: \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ecdi (b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành)<\/p>

D. must be calling: ph\u1ea3i g\u1ecdi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: \"may\" di\u1ec5n t\u1ea3 vi\u1ec7c có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng x\u1ea3y ra, không ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn là s\u1ebd x\u1ea3y ra<\/p>","en":"

Depending on your answers to the survey, we may call you to collect additional information<\/p>

###<\/p>

Tùy thu\u1ed9c vào câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n cho cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát, chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi cho b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 thu th\u1eadp thông tin b\u1ed5 sung<\/p>

A. may call<\/p>

B. are calling<\/p>

C. have been called<\/p>

D. must be calling<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: \"may\" describes sth likely to happen<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ Jemburger opened its newest franchise, the first 100 customers were given free hamburgers
childrens.answers: ["Now","When","As if","After all"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

When Jemburger opened its newest franchise, the first 100 customers were given free hamburgers<\/p>

###<\/p>

Khi Jemburger m\u1edf c\u1eeda hàng nh\u01b0\u1ee3ng quy\u1ec1n th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a mình, 100 khách hàng \u0111\u1ea7u tiên \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1eb7ng bánh hamburger mi\u1ec5n phí<\/p>

A. Now: bây gi\u1edd<\/p>

B. When: khi<\/p>

C. As if: nh\u01b0 th\u1ec3 là<\/p>
