 <\/p>","en":"

When Jemburger opened its newest franchise, the first 100 customers were given free hamburgers<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Now<\/p>

B. When<\/p>

C. As if<\/p>

D. After all<\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please include the serial number of your product in any ____ with the customer service department
childrens.answers: ["corresponds","correspondence","correspondingly","correspondent"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please include the serial number of your product in any correspondence with the customer service department<\/p>

###<\/p>

Vui lòng thêm s\u1ed1 sê-ri c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 trao \u0111\u1ed5i nào v\u1edbi b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng<\/p>

A. corresponds: trao \u0111\u1ed5i (th\u01b0 t\u1eeb, mail,...) (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. correspondence: s\u1ef1 trao \u0111\u1ed5i (qua th\u01b0, mail,..) (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. correspondingly: do \u0111ó, vì l\u1ebd \u0111ó<\/p>

D. correspondent: t\u01b0\u01a1ng x\u1ee9ng (tính t\u1eeb)\/ phóng viên (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

 ###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Any + danh t\u1eeb (correspondence), trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p này c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 v\u1eadt, s\u1ef1 vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>","en":"

Please include the serial number of your product in any correspondence with the customer service department<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. corresponds: Verb<\/p>

B. correspondence: Noun<\/p>

C. correspondingly: Adv<\/p>

D. correspondent: Adj<\/p>

 ###<\/p>

Explanation: Any + N (correspondence)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The award-winning film UnderWater Secrets promotes awareness ____ ocean pollution and its effects on our planet
childrens.answers: ["of","to","from","with"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The award-winning film UnderWater Secrets promotes awareness of ocean pollution and its effects on our planet<\/p>

###<\/p>

B\u1ed9 phim \u0111o\u1ea1t gi\u1ea3i UnderWater Secrets giúp nâng cao nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 ô nhi\u1ec5m \u0111\u1ea1i d\u01b0\u01a1ng và \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a nó \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi hành tinh c\u1ee7a chúng ta<\/p>

A. of: c\u1ee7a<\/p>

B. to: t\u1edbi, v\u1edbi<\/p>

C. from: t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. with: v\u1edbi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: awareness of sth: nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì<\/p>","en":"

The award-winning film UnderWater Secrets promotes awareness of ocean pollution and its effects on our planet<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. of<\/p>

B. to<\/p>

C. from<\/p>

D. with<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Collocation: awareness of sth<\/p>"}

childrens.title: BYF Company specializes in ____ promotional items to help companies advertise their brand
childrens.answers: ["personally","personalized","personality","personalizes"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

BYF Company specializes in personalized promotional items to help companies advertise their brand<\/p>

###<\/p>

Công ty BYF chuyên v\u1ec1 các v\u1eadt ph\u1ea9m qu\u1ea3ng cáo \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cá nhân hóa \u0111\u1ec3 giúp các công ty qu\u1ea3ng cáo th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd<\/p>

A. personally: m\u1ed9t cách cá nhân (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb) <\/p>

B. personalized: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cá nhân hóa (tính t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. personality: tính cách (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. personalizes: cá nhân hóa (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng có th\u1ec3 \u0111i\u1ec1n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb ho\u1eb7c tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb, tuy nhiên \"personally\" không phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi c\u1ea3nh<\/p>","en":"

BYF Company specializes in personalized promotional items to help companies advertise their brand<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. personally: Adv<\/p>

B. personalized: Adj<\/p>

C. personality: Noun<\/p>

D. personalizes: Verb<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: The blank can be filled with an adj or an adv, but the adv \"personally\" is not suitable in this context<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ the rent increase is less than 2 percent, Selwin Electrical Supply will continue to lease the space
childrens.answers: ["As long as","Along with","Not only","Otherwise"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

As long as the rent increase is less than 2 percent, Selwin Electrical Supply will continue to lease the space<\/p>

###<\/p>

Mi\u1ec5n là m\u1ee9c t\u0103ng ti\u1ec1n thuê d\u01b0\u1edbi 2 ph\u1ea7n tr\u0103m, Selwin Electrical Supply s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c thuê m\u1eb7t b\u1eb1ng<\/p>

A. As long as: mi\u1ec5n là<\/p>

B. Along with: cùng v\u1edbi<\/p>

C. Not only: không nh\u1eefng (th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111i cùng \"but also\": mà còn)<\/p>

D. Otherwise: N\u1ebfu không thì<\/p>","en":"

As long as the rent increase is less than 2 percent, Selwin Electrical Supply will continue to lease the space<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. As long as + clause<\/p>

B. Along with +N<\/p>

C. Not only (... but also)<\/p>

D. Otherwise + clause<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Belden Hospital's chief of staff meets regularly with the staff to ensure that procedures ____ correctly
childrens.answers: ["to be performed","would have performed","had been performed","are being performed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Belden Hospital's chief of staff meets regularly with the staff to ensure that procedures are being performed correctly<\/p>

###<\/p>

Giám \u0111\u1ed1c b\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n Belden th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 nhân viên \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng các th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t cách chính xác.<\/p>

A. To be performed: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n<\/p>

B. would have performed: l\u1ebd ra nên th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n<\/p>

C. had been performed: \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n xong<\/p>

D. are being performed: \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: các th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c \"procedures\" v\u1eabn \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n nên m\u1edbi giám \u0111\u1ed9c b\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n m\u1edbi c\u1ea7n th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên giám sát. <\/p>","en":"

Belden Hospital's chief of staff meets regularly with the staff to ensure that procedures are being performed correctly<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. To be performed<\/p>

B. would have performed: want to do but did not do<\/p>

C. had been performed: done <\/p>

D. are being performed: still going on<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: The action of performing the procedures are happening in the present <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Any requests for time off should be addressed to the ____ department supervisor
childrens.answers: ["urgent","appropriate","subsequent","deliverable"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Any requests for time off should be addressed to the appropriate department supervisor<\/p>

###<\/p>

B\u1ea5t kì yêu c\u1ea7u xin ngh\u1ec9 nào c\u0169ng nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn giám sát phù h\u1ee3p<\/p>

A. urgent: kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p<\/p>

B. appropriate: phù h\u1ee3p<\/p>

C. subsequent: x\u1ea3y ra sau<\/p>

D. deliverable: có th\u1ec3 v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n <\/p>","en":"

Any requests for time off should be addressed to the appropriate department supervisor<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. urgent: that needs to be dealt with or happen immediately<\/p>

B. appropriate: suitable<\/p>

C. subsequent: happening or coming after something else<\/p>

D. deliverable<\/p>"}

childrens.title: World Fish Supply delivers the freshest fish possible thanks to innovative ____ and shipping methods
childrens.answers: ["preserves","preserved","preserve","preservation"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

World Fish Supply delivers the freshest fish possible thanks to innovative preservation and shipping methods<\/p>

###<\/p>

World Fish Supply cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng con cá t\u01b0\u01a1i ngon nh\u1ea5t nh\u1edd các ph\u01b0\u01a1ng pháp b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n và v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n sáng t\u1ea1o<\/p>

A. preserves: b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chia hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i)<\/p>

B. preserved: b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chia quá kh\u1ee9)<\/p>

C. preserve: b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên th\u1ec3)<\/p>

D. preservation: s\u1ef1 b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n (danh t\u1eeb) <\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Thanks to + danh t\u1eeb: nh\u1edd vào cái gì<\/p>","en":"

World Fish Supply delivers the freshest fish possible thanks to innovative preservation and shipping methods<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. preserves: V (present simple)<\/p>

B. preserved: V (past simple)<\/p>

C. preserve: V-infinitive<\/p>

D. preservation: s\u1ef1 b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Thanks to + Noun<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Company executives are currently reviewing the annual budget ____ submitted to them by the Financial Planning department
childrens.answers: ["requirements","deliveries","developers","qualities"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Company executives are currently reviewing the annual budget requirements submitted to them by the Financial Planning department<\/p>

###<\/p>

Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành công ty hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang xem xét các yêu c\u1ea7u ngân sách hàng n\u0103m do b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn K\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch Tài chính \u0111\u1ec7 trình cho h\u1ecd<\/p>

A. requirements: các yêu c\u1ea7u<\/p>

B. deliveries: s\u1ef1 phân phát (hàng)<\/p>

C. developers: các nhà phát tri\u1ec3n<\/p>

D. qualities: ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t<\/p>","en":"

Company executives are currently reviewing the annual budget requirements submitted to them by the Financial Planning department<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. requirements<\/p>

B. deliveries<\/p>

C. developers<\/p>

D. qualities<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Even the CEO had to admit that Prasma Designs' win was ____ the result of fortunate timing
childrens.answers: ["parts","parted","partly","parting"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Even the CEO had to admit that Prasma Designs' win was partly the result of fortunate timing<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ngay c\u1ea3 CEO c\u0169ng ph\u1ea3i th\u1eeba nh\u1eadn r\u1eb1ng chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng c\u1ee7a Prasma Designs m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n là k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a s\u1ef1 may r\u1ee7i<\/p>

A. part: ph\u1ea7n, b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. parted: b\u1ecb chia thành t\u1eebng ph\u1ea7n (tính t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. partly: m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. parting: bu\u1ed5i chia tay (danh t\u1eeb) <\/p>","en":"

Even the CEO had to admit that Prasma Designs' win was partly the result of fortunate timing<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. part: Noun<\/p>

B. parted: Adj<\/p>

C. partly: Adv<\/p>

D. parting: Noun (the act or occasion of leaving a person or place)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Singh took notes on ____ the focus group discussed during the morning session
childrens.answers: ["each","several","another","everything"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Mr. Singh took notes on everything the focus group discussed during the morning session<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ông Singh \u0111ã ghi chú l\u1ea1i m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 mà nhóm tr\u1ecdng tâm \u0111ã th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn trong phiên h\u1ecdp bu\u1ed5i sáng<\/p>

A. each: m\u1ed7i (+danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít)<\/p>

B. several: m\u1ed9t vài (+danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u)<\/p>

C. another: m\u1ed9t cái khác (+danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít)<\/p>

D. everything: t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3<\/p>

 <\/p>","en":"

Mr. Singh took notes on everything the focus group discussed during the morning session<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. each + singular N<\/p>

B. several + plural N<\/p>

C. another + singular N<\/p>

D. everything<\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Last year, Tadaka Computer Solutions ranked third ____ in regional earnings
childrens.answers: ["together","overall","consecutively","generally"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Last year, Tadaka Computer Solutions ranked third overall in regional earnings<\/p>

###<\/p>

N\u0103m ngoái, Gi\u1ea3i pháp máy tính Tadaka x\u1ebfp th\u1ee9 ba v\u1ec1 t\u1ed5ng thu nh\u1eadp trong khu v\u1ef1c<\/p>

A. together: cùng nhau <\/p>

B. overall: t\u1ed5ng<\/p>

C. consecutively: liên ti\u1ebfp<\/p>

D. generally: nhìn chung <\/p>","en":"

Last year, Tadaka Computer Solutions ranked third overall in regional earnings<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. together<\/p>

B. overall<\/p>

C. consecutively<\/p>

D. generally<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ the popularity of the BPT39 wireless speaker, production will be increased fivefold starting next month
childrens.answers: ["On behalf of","Whether","Moreover","As a result of"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

As a result of the popularity of the BPT39 wireless speaker, production will be increased fivefold starting next month<\/p>

###<\/p>

Do s\u1ef1 ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a loa không dây BPT39, s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ebd t\u0103ng g\u1ea5p 5 l\u1ea7n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb tháng t\u1edbi<\/p>

A. On behalf of + danh t\u1eeb: \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n cho <\/p>

B. Whether: li\u1ec7u r\u1eb1ng<\/p>

C. Moreover: h\u01a1n n\u1eefa (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb liên k\u1ebft 2 câu)<\/p>

D. As a result of + danh t\u1eeb: là k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a, vì<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: As a result of + the popularity (danh t\u1eeb) <\/p>","en":"

As a result of the popularity of the BPT39 wireless speaker, production will be increased fivefold starting next month<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. On behalf of + Noun<\/p>

B. Whether<\/p>

C. Moreover: conjunction connects 2 clauses<\/p>

D. As a result of + Noun<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: As a result of + the popularity (N)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Zypo Properties has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm ____ offices are on the third floor
childrens.answers: ["how","what","whose","wherever"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Zypo Properties has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm whose offices are on the third floor<\/p>

###<\/p>

Zypo Properties v\u1eeba ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng thuê v\u1edbi công ty lu\u1eadt có v\u0103n phòng trên t\u1ea7ng 3<\/p>

A. how: nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào (t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi)<\/p>

B. what: cái gì (t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi)<\/p>

C. whose + danh t\u1eeb: c\u1ee7a ai<\/p>

D. wherever: b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 n\u01a1i \u0111âu<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: The law firm (danh t\u1eeb 1) + whose + offices (danh t\u1eeb 2) + are (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>","en":"

Zypo Properties has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm whose offices are on the third floor<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. how<\/p>

B. what<\/p>

C. whose <\/p>

D. wherever<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: The law firm (N1) + whose + offices (N2) + are (V)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ events this year caused profits in the second and third quarters to differ significantly from original projections
childrens.answers: ["Total","Marginal","Representative","Unforeseen"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Unforeseen events this year caused profits in the second and third quarters to differ significantly from original projections<\/p>

###<\/p>

Nh\u1eefng s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n không l\u01b0\u1eddng tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trong n\u0103m nay khi\u1ebfn l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn trong quý 2 và quý 3 chênh l\u1ec7ch \u0111áng k\u1ec3 so v\u1edbi d\u1ef1 báo ban \u0111\u1ea7u<\/p>

A. Total: t\u1ed5ng<\/p>

B. Marginal: Bên l\u1ec1<\/p>

C. Representative: \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n<\/p>

D. Unforeseen: không \u0111oán tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>","en":"

Unforeseen events this year caused profits in the second and third quarters to differ significantly from original projections<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. Total<\/p>

B. Marginal<\/p>

C. Representative<\/p>

D. Unforeseen<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The timeline for the pathway lighting project was extended to ____ input from the environmental commission
childrens.answers: ["use up","believe in","make into","allow for"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The timeline for the pathway lighting project was extended to allow for input from the environmental commission<\/p>

###<\/p>

L\u1ecbch trình c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 án chi\u1ebfu sáng l\u1ed1i \u0111i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kéo dài \u0111\u1ec3 cân nh\u1eafc các thông tin t\u1eeb \u1ee7y ban môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

A. use up: s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng h\u1ebft <\/p>

B. believe in: tin t\u01b0\u1edfng vào <\/p>

C. make into: t\u1ea1o thành <\/p>

D. allow for: cân nh\u1eafc<\/p>","en":"

The timeline for the pathway lighting project was extended to allow for input from the environmental commission<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. use up<\/p>

B. believe in<\/p>

C. make into<\/p>

D. allow for: consider<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read: With Global Strength Gym's 30-day trial period, you get the opportunity to try out our classes, equipment, and facilities. __(1)__ . It's completely risk-free! To sign up, we require your contact information and payment details, but you will only be charged if you are a member for __(2)__ 30 days. If you decide within this time that you no longer want to be a member of Global Strength __(3)__ visit our Web site at www.gsgym.com. On the Membership page, elect to __(4)__ your membership and enter the necessary information. It's that easy!
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

V\u1edbi th\u1eddi gian dùng th\u1eed 30 ngày c\u1ee7a Global Strength Gym, b\u1ea1n có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i h\u1ecdc th\u1eed các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc, dùng các thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb và c\u01a1 s\u1edf v\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Trong su\u1ed1t quá trình tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m, b\u1ea1n không ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 b\u1ea5t kì kho\u1ea3n phí nào và không ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng. Và hoàn toàn không có r\u1ee7i ro! \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký, chúng tôi yêu c\u1ea7u b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i thông tin liên h\u1ec7 và chi ti\u1ebft thanh toán, nh\u01b0ng b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 phí n\u1ebfu là thành viên trên 30 ngày. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh không là thành viên c\u1ee7a Global Strength n\u1eefa, ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i www.gsgym.com. Trên trang Thành viên, ch\u1ecdn h\u1ee7y t\u01b0 cách thành viên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và nh\u1eadp các thông tin c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft. Hoàn toàn d\u1ec5 nh\u01b0 v\u1eady thôi!<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["Throughout the trial, you pay nothing and sign no contract","Weight-lifting classes are not currently available","A cash deposit is required when you sign up for membership","All questions should be e-mailed to [email\u00a0protected] com"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__ (1) __<\/p>

A. Trong su\u1ed1t th\u1eddi gian dùng th\u1eed, b\u1ea1n không ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 ti\u1ec1n và không ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng<\/p>

B. Hi\u1ec7n không có l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc nâng t\u1ea1<\/p>

C. C\u1ea7n \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ecdc ti\u1ec1n m\u1eb7t khi \u0111\u0103ng ký thành viên<\/p>

D. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các câu h\u1ecfi nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn [email protected] com<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\"Throughout the trial\" (trong su\u1ed1t quá trình tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m) \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eafc l\u1ea1i và liên k\u1ebft ý \"the opportunity to try out\" (c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i dùng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u1eed) \u1edf câu tr\u01b0\u1edbc; \"Risk-free\" (không có r\u1ee7i ro) \u1edf câu sau \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh và b\u1ed1 sung ý ngh\u0129a cho \"sign no contract\" (không kí h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng)<\/p>","en":"

__(1)__<\/p>

A. Throughout the trial, you pay nothing and sign no contract<\/p>

B. Weight-lifting classes are not currently available<\/p>

C. A cash deposit is required when you sign up for membership<\/p>

D. All questions should be e-mailed to [email protected] com<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

The sentence before the blank (1) mentions \"the opportunity to try out\"; \"risk-free\" refers to the act \"sign no contract\"<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["not even","almost","over","less than"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__ (2) __<\/p>

A. th\u1eadm chí không<\/p>

B. g\u1ea7n <\/p>

C. h\u01a1n<\/p>

D. ít h\u01a1n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Thành viên ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m mi\u1ec5n phí 30 ngày, n\u1ebfu mu\u1ed1n dùng nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n 30 ngày thì ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 phí.<\/p>","en":"

__(2)__<\/p>

A. not even<\/p>

B. almost<\/p>

C. over<\/p>

D. less than<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

You will only be charged if you are a member for over 30 days<\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["justly","regularly","evenly","simply"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__ (3) __<\/p>

A. m\u1ed9t cách công b\u1eb1ng<\/p>

B. th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên<\/p>

C. \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ec1u<\/p>

questions.text_read: As a Hanson-Roves employee, you are entitled to sick absences, during which you will be paid for time off work for health __(1)__ . To avoid deductions to your pay you __(2)__ to provide a physician-signed note as documentation of your illness. __(3)__ should include the date you were seen by the doctor, a statement certifying that you are unable to perform the duties of your position, and your expected date of return. Your supervisor will then forward the documentation to Human Resources. __(4)__ . Employee health records can be accessed only by those with a valid business reason for reviewing them
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Là nhân viên c\u1ee7a Hanson-Roves, b\u1ea1n có quy\u1ec1n ngh\u1ec9 \u1ed1m, trong th\u1eddi gian \u0111ó b\u1ea1n v\u1eabn s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng cho th\u1eddi gian ngh\u1ec9 làm vì lý do s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe. \u0110\u1ec3 tránh b\u1ecb tr\u1eeb l\u01b0\u01a1ng, b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u ph\u1ea3i cung c\u1ea5p gi\u1ea5y báo có ch\u1eef ký c\u1ee7a bác s\u0129 trong h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 b\u1ec7nh án. Nó ph\u1ea3i bao g\u1ed3m ngày bác s\u0129 khám b\u1ec7nh, xác nh\u1eadn b\u1ea1n không th\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n các công vi\u1ec7c \u0111ang làm và ngày tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i làm vi\u1ec7c d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Sau \u0111ó, c\u1ea5p trên s\u1ebd chuy\u1ec3n tài li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ebfn Phòng Nhân s\u1ef1. Hanson-Roves \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o tính b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt thông tin s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Ch\u1ec9 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi có lý do kinh doanh h\u1ee3p l\u1ec7 m\u1edbi có th\u1ec3 xem h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a nhân viên.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: [email protected]
From: [email protected]
Date: 15 July
Subject: Your first day at Arolis

Dear Mr. Contini,

Welcome to Arolis Chemicals! Thank you for __(1)__ the full-time, permanent position of laboratory assistant. We look forward to your arrival on 1 August in the Harris Building. Please report to the front desk and ask for Jack McNolan. He __(2)__ you to the Human Resources office. There, you will obtain your employee badge __(3)__ all documents necessary to start work. Note that because of its large size, the Leicester campus of Arolis can be difficult to navigate. Studying a campus map will help orient you to the location of the different buildings. __(4)__

Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Sincerely,

Brandon Takemoto
HR Administrative Officer
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: [email \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt]
T\u1eeb: [email \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt]
Ngày: 15 tháng 7
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n t\u1ea1i Arolis<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi ông Contini,<\/p>

Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Arolis Chemicals! C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb trí tr\u1ee3 lý phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m toàn th\u1eddi gian, lâu dài. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p b\u1ea1n vào ngày 1 tháng 8 t\u1ea1i Tòa nhà Harris. Vui lòng báo cáo v\u1edbi qu\u1ea7y l\u1ec5 tân và h\u1ecfi Jack McNolan. Anh \u1ea5y s\u1ebd \u0111i cùng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn phòng Nhân s\u1ef1. T\u1ea1i \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ebb nhân viên c\u1ee7a mình c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các tài li\u1ec7u c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u công vi\u1ec7c. L\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng khuôn viên Leicester c\u1ee7a Arolis r\u1ea5t r\u1ed9ng nên b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y h\u01a1i khó \u0111\u1ec3 xác \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb trí. Xem k\u0129 b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 khuôn viên s\u1ebd giúp b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ecb trí c\u1ee7a các tòa nhà khác nhau. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 t\u1ea3i b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 xu\u1ed1ng t\u1eeb trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào, xin vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi tôi.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Brandon Takemoto
Nhân viên hành chính nhân s\u1ef1<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
(18 April)-MKZ Foods, Inc., the region's largest exporter of pecans, expects its outgoing shipments to increase significantly over the next few months. This __(1)__ is based on the fact that the region's pecan farmers expanded their land area by 20 percent last year. According to spokesperson Katharina Seiler, MKZ's exports could reach a colossal 50,000 metric tons this year. __(2)__ 

MKZ buys most of the yield from the region's pecan farms and processes it __(3)__ export throughout the world. "The availability of new land for __(4)__ in the region is creating opportunities for growth," said Ms. Seiler. "I believe MKZ is going to have a truly outstanding year."
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

(18\/04) -MKZ Foods, Inc., nhà xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u h\u1ed3 \u0111ào l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t khu v\u1ef1c, d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn các lô hàng xu\u1ea5t \u0111i c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd s\u1ebd t\u0103ng \u0111áng k\u1ec3 trong vài tháng t\u1edbi. D\u1ef1 báo này d\u1ef1a trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf là nông dân tr\u1ed3ng h\u1ed3 \u0111ào trong khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ã m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng di\u1ec7n tích \u0111\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd thêm 20% vào n\u0103m ngoái. Theo ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n phát ngôn Katharina Seiler, xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a MKZ có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea1t m\u1ed9t con s\u1ed1 kh\u1ed5ng l\u1ed3 50.000 t\u1ea5n trong n\u0103m nay. \u0110ó là con s\u1ed1 ch\u01b0a t\u1eebng có trong l\u1ecbch s\u1eed c\u1ee7a công ty.<\/p>

MKZ mua ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1eeb các trang tr\u1ea1i h\u1ed3 \u0111ào trong khu v\u1ef1c và ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ec3 xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u trên kh\u1eafp th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. Bà Seiler cho bi\u1ebft: “\u0110\u1ea5t m\u1edbi luôn có s\u1eb5n \u0111\u1ec3 canh tác trong khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ang t\u1ea1o ra c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i phát tri\u1ec3n. Tôi tin r\u1eb1ng MKZ s\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t n\u0103m th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc.\"<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne
intro.answers: ["A. a homebody", "B. an introvert", "C. a clumsy person", "D. a risk-taker"]

Chakia Brown [3:32 P.M.]<\/p>

Chào Ziva. Tôi v\u1eeba g\u1eb7p ban giám \u0111\u1ed1c Han và h\u1ecd r\u1ea5t quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn các \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf l\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng ta cho v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1. Cô Amy Han \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n m\u1eabu công vi\u1ec7c khác nh\u01b0ng tôi không mang theo. Bây gi\u1edd tôi \u0111ang chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb có cu\u1ed9c h\u1ee3p, vui lòng hãy chuy\u1ec3n b\u1ea3n sao các tài li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a trung tâm Grainger \u0111\u1ebfn cô \u1ea5y giúp tôi. Nh\u1edb bao g\u1ed3m toàn b\u1ed9 các k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

G\u1eedi: Nhân viên thu ngân c\u1ee7a Oak Lane Fashion
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Jane Benson
Ngày: 8 tháng 7
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt
B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb ngày 1 tháng 8, Oak Lane Fashion s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i ho\u1eb7c trao \u0111\u1ed5i qu\u1ea7n áo ch\u01b0a m\u1eb7c và ch\u01b0a b\u1ecb h\u01b0 h\u1ea1i có hóa \u0111\u01a1n g\u1ed1c.
Thông tin này s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng t\u1ea1i t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các qu\u1ea7y thanh toán vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi. Chúng tôi c\u0169ng s\u1ebd g\u1eedi e-mail cho khách hàng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecd bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 quy t\u1eafc m\u1edbi. N\u1ebfu khách hàng mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ed5i tr\u1ea3 hàng mà không có biên lai, vui lòng g\u1ecdi cho qu\u1ea3n lý tr\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
Jane Benson
Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the e-mail?
childrens.answers: ["To request a sales report","To announce a new policy","To discuss a fashion trend","To describe an upcoming sale"]

{"vn":"

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a e-mail là gì?<\/p>

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a e-mail là gì?<\/p>

A. Quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh tr\u01b0ng bày m\u1eb7t hàng m\u1edbi nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i Carmont Media, v\u0103n hóa làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a chúng tôi là d\u1ef1a trên s\u1ee9 m\u1ec7nh. Chúng tôi tuy\u1ec3n nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi có chung m\u1ee5c tiêu là làm giàu trí tu\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a thính gi\u1ea3 thông qua nh\u1eefng tin t\u1ee9c h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn và trung th\u1ef1c. Chúng tôi c\u0169ng tích c\u1ef1c tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 nhân viên \u0111a d\u1ea1ng \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ea3n ánh khán gi\u1ea3 \u1edf Trinidadian và Tobagonian. S\u1ef1 \u0111a d\u1ea1ng c\u1ee7a Carmont Media ph\u1ea7n nào n\u1eb1m \u1edf \u0111\u1ed9i Star. Các \u0111\u1ed9i này bao g\u1ed3m công nhân t\u1eeb t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các c\u1ea5p c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c, h\u1ecdp th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c các bu\u1ed5i th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn nh\u1eb1m nâng cao hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 và n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t. Carmont Media mang \u0111\u1ebfn c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i th\u0103ng ti\u1ebfn ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p và thúc \u0111\u1ea9y s\u1ef1 cân b\u1eb1ng gi\u1eefa công vi\u1ec7c và cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Louisa Santos 9:30 sáng
Kenji, anh \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111âu? Các \u1ee9ng c\u1eed viên \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111ây.

Ti\u1ebfc quá! C\u1ea7u v\u1eabn b\u1ecb ch\u1eb7n. Xe buýt ph\u1ea3i \u0111i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng vòng. Tôi s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t trong 30 phút n\u1eefa. Cô c\u1ee9 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u luôn \u0111i.
Louisa Santos 9:34 sáng

Louisa Santos 9:35 sáng
\u0110úng.Tin \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không, công ty nh\u1ecf c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ee9c c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i thuê vài ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng?
Kenji Muro 9:36 sáng
Tôi bi\u1ebft! Ok. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p cô s\u1edbm.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Mark Chandler is Back!

The Administrative Services Division welcomes back to headquarters Associate Director Mark Chandler. -[1]-. Mark spent the last month in Ottawa attending an advanced training session about corporate information security. Corporate-security training allows a company to safeguard its sensitive, confidential, and proprietary information. Mark is among a growing number of corporate executives who have successfully graduated from this rigorous course. -[2]-. A member of the National Organization of Corporate Security Officers (NOCSO), Mark
was formally recognized by the organization for his part in developing software that keeps electronic documents safe. - [3]-. Well done, Mark! - [4] -.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

###<\/p>

Mark Chandler \u0111ã tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i!<\/p>

B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Hành chính chào m\u1eebng s\u1ef1 tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf Phó Giám \u0111\u1ed1c Mark Chandler. - [1] -. Mark \u0111ã dành c\u1ea3 tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u1edf Ottawa \u0111\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o nâng cao v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt thông tin doanh nghi\u1ec7p. \u0110ào t\u1ea1o b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt doanh nghi\u1ec7p cho phép m\u1ed9t công ty b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 thông tin nh\u1ea1y c\u1ea3m, bí m\u1eadt và \u0111\u1ed9c quy\u1ec1n c\u1ee7a mình. Mark là m\u1ed9t trong s\u1ed1 các giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành công ty \u0111ã t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p thành công khóa h\u1ecdc nghiêm ng\u1eb7t này. - [2] -. Là thành viên c\u1ee7a T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c Qu\u1ed1c gia v\u1ec1 Cán b\u1ed9 An ninh Doanh nghi\u1ec7p (NOCSO), Mark chính th\u1ee9c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c này công nh\u1eadn vì \u0111ã tham gia phát tri\u1ec3n ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m gi\u1eef an toàn cho các tài li\u1ec7u \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed. - [3] -. Làm t\u1ed1t l\u1eafm, Mark! - [4] -.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How did Mr. Chandler improve corporate security?
childrens.answers: ["He trained his company's security officers","He helped design a system for securely storing documents","He assisted in developing new safety guidelines","He recruited employees who specialize in corporate security"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ông Chandler \u0111ã c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n an ninh doanh nghi\u1ec7p th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

A. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ào t\u1ea1o các nhân viên an ninh c\u1ee7a công ty<\/p>

B. Ông \u1ea5y giúp thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng l\u01b0u tr\u1eef tài li\u1ec7u an toàn<\/p>

C. Ông \u1ea5y h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 phát tri\u1ec3n các h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn an toàn m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. Ông \u1ea5y tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng nh\u1eefng nhân viên chuyên v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Mark was formally recognized by the organization for his part in developing software that keeps electronic documents safe<\/p>","en":"

How did Mr. Chandler improve corporate security?<\/p>

A. He trained his company's security officers<\/p>

B. He helped design a system for securely storing documents<\/p>

C. He assisted in developing new safety guidelines<\/p>

D. He recruited employees who specialize in corporate security<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Mark was formally recognized by the organization for his part in developing software that keeps electronic documents safe.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? "The training included 60 hours of instruction and a comprehensive written exam."

Câu \"khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o bao g\u1ed3m 60 gi\u1edd gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y và kì thi vi\u1ebft toàn di\u1ec7n\" n\u1eb1m \u1edf v\u1ecb trí nào trong bài?<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

 <\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: \"The training\" \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u0129a v\u1edbi \"the course\" trong bài: Mark is among a growing number of corporate executives who have successfully graduated from this rigorous course.<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? \"The training included 60 hours of instruction and a comprehensive written exam.\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: \"The training\" is the synonym of \"the course\": Mark is among a growing number of corporate executives who have successfully graduated from this rigorous course.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Chúc m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111ã mua Megagroome, máy c\u1ea1o râu có th\u1ec3 s\u1ea1c l\u1ea1i t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi! \u0110\u1ec3 gi\u1eef cho máy c\u1ea1o râu c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n luôn ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1ed1t, hãy làm s\u1ea1ch máy c\u1ea1o râu hàng tu\u1ea7n b\u1eb1ng cách cho máy ch\u1ea1y d\u01b0\u1edbi vòi n\u01b0\u1edbc nóng. M\u1ed7i tháng m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n, hãy tháo r\u1eddi máy c\u1ea1o râu và làm s\u1ea1ch ph\u1ea7n bên trong k\u1ef9 l\u01b0\u1ee1ng nh\u01b0 trong sách h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng. Các \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ea1o nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thay th\u1ebf hàng n\u0103m v\u1edbi các b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn thay th\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê trong sách h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn.<\/p>

Máy c\u1ea1o râu Megagroome có pin lithium ion nên dùng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vài n\u0103m. Vui lòng s\u1ea1c máy c\u1ea1o râu th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên. Không c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft ph\u1ea3i x\u1ea3 h\u1ebft pin tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi s\u1ea1c l\u1ea1i. Ch\u1ec9 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng b\u1ed9 s\u1ea1c \u0111i kèm, vì vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 b\u1ed9 s\u1ea1c nào khác có th\u1ec3 làm m\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c b\u1ea3o hành. H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 và chi ti\u1ebft có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tìm th\u1ea5y trong sách h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c\u1ee7a ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the shaver's battery?
childrens.answers: ["It must run out before charging","It may be charged whenever necessary","It is able to hold a charge for a week","It will work with different chargers"]
childrens.explains:

\u0110i\u1ec1u nào sau \u0111ây nói v\u1ec1 pin c\u1ee7a dao c\u1ea1o?<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea2O TÀNG \u0110A D\u1ea0NG<\/p>

B\u1ea3o tàng L\u1ecbch s\u1eed và \u0110\u1ed3 t\u1ea1o tác \u0110a v\u0103n hóa<\/p>

Chúng tôi t\u1ef1 hào thông báo tri\u1ec3n lãm m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a mình: Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Nam M\u1ef9.<\/p>

Tri\u1ec3n lãm s\u1ebd m\u1edf c\u1eeda vào ngày 7 tháng 6 trong khuôn kh\u1ed5 ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Vòng quanh Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra c\u1ee7a b\u1ea3o tàng. B\u1ea3o tàng \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 phí vào c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 các nhà b\u1ea3o tr\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ec1u có th\u1ec3 xem tri\u1ec3n lãm. N\u01a1i \u0111ây s\u1ebd tr\u01b0ng bày các tác ph\u1ea9m ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt l\u1ecbch s\u1eed và \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a các ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 Nam M\u1ef9 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng.<\/p>

Julio Carrera - ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 trách cu\u1ed9c tri\u1ec3n sáu tu\u1ea7n này, s\u1ebd mang \u0111\u1ebfn ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c chuyên môn sâu r\u1ed9ng. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tham gia qu\u1ea3n lý b\u1ea3o tàng vào tháng 3 n\u0103m nay, ông Carrera là ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 trách Vi\u1ec7n Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Brazil trong sáu n\u0103m và dành ba n\u0103m \u0111\u1ec3 nghiên c\u1ee9u các hi\u1ec7n v\u1eadt c\u1ed5 cho Centro de la Historia del Arte, m\u1ed9t trung tâm b\u1ea3o t\u1ed3n ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt \u1edf Venezuela.<\/p>

Tri\u1ec3n lãm Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Nam M\u1ef9 s\u1ebd bao g\u1ed3m các b\u1ee9c tranh, tác ph\u1ea9m \u0111iêu kh\u1eafc, công c\u1ee5 ch\u1ebf tác, qu\u1ea7n áo, \u0111\u1ed3 trang s\u1ee9c, tranh t\u01b0\u1eddng và \u0111\u1ed3 g\u1ed1m \u0111\u1ea5t sét t\u1eeb sáu qu\u1ed1c gia Nam M\u1ef9. Các ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb các qu\u1ed1c gia này s\u1ebd t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c các h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt vào nh\u1eefng ngày \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn trong tháng B\u1ea3y. Chi phí cho m\u1ed7i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o là 10 b\u1ea3ng Anh ngoài phí nh\u1eadp h\u1ecdc thông th\u01b0\u1eddng và bao g\u1ed3m các v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the South American Art exhibit?
childrens.answers: ["It is the first exhibit in the Arts Around the World program","It will be on display only through the end of June","It includes both old and new art","It focuses on wall hangings and murals"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u nào sau \u0111ây nói v\u1ec1 Tri\u1ec3n lãm Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Nam M\u1ef9?<\/p>

A. Nó là tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0111\u1ea7u tiên trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt trên toàn th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Nó ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c di\u1ec5n ra vào cu\u1ed1i tháng 6<\/p>

C. Nó có c\u1ea3 ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt l\u1ecbch s\u1eed và \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i<\/p>

D. Nó t\u1eadp trung ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu vào tranh t\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: It will feature historical and contemporary artwork displays from renowned South American artists.<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about the South American Art exhibit?<\/p>

A. It is the first exhibit in the Arts Around the World program<\/p>

B. It will be on display only through the end of June<\/p>

C. It includes both old and new art<\/p>

D. It focuses on wall hangings and murals<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: It will feature historical and contemporary artwork displays from renowned South American artists.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Who is Mr. Carrera?
childrens.answers: ["A visiting artist","An art journalist","A volunteer tour guide","A museum employee"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ông Carrera là ai?<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: The curator of the six-week exhibition, Julio Carrera, will bring his vast expertise to the museum. <\/p>","en":"

Who is Mr. Carrera?<\/p>

A. A visiting artist<\/p>

B. An art journalist<\/p>

D. A museum employee<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: The curator of the six-week exhibition, Julio Carrera, will bring his vast expertise to the museum. <\/p>"}

childrens.title: According to the Web page, what can museum patrons do for an extra fee?
childrens.answers: ["Watch a video on South America","Attend an art class","Explore a new exhibit","Sponsor an upcoming exhibit"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Theo trang Web, các nhà b\u1ea3o tr\u1ee3 dùng kho\u1ea3n ph\u1ee5 phí \u0111\u1ec3 làm gì?<\/p>

A. Xem video v\u1ec1 Nam M\u1ef9<\/p>

B. Tham gia l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt<\/p>

C. Khám phá các bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n lãm m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. Tài tr\u1ee3 cho bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n lãm s\u1eafp t\u1edbi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: The cost for each workshop is £10 in addition to the regular admission fee and includes basic art supplies.<\/p>","en":"

According to the Web page, what can museum patrons do for an extra fee?<\/p>

A. Watch a video on South America<\/p>

B. Attend an art class<\/p>

C. Explore a new exhibit<\/p>

D. Sponsor an upcoming exhibit<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: The cost for each workshop is £10 in addition to the regular admission fee and includes basic art supplies.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Oliver Koh (10:15 sáng)
Xin chào, Aaron và Denise. Không bi\u1ebft có gói hàng g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn cho tôi không? \u0110áng l\u1ebd hôm nay tôi s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tài li\u1ec7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao, nh\u01b0ng có l\u1ebd chúng \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác do nh\u1ea7m l\u1eabn. Nó là c\u1ee7a Schrantz Farm Organics và ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dán nhãn kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p.<\/p>

Aaron Koskinen (10:17 sáng)
Không có gì g\u1eedi cho b\u1ea1n t\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y l\u1ec5 tân c\u1ea3. B\u1ea1n th\u1eed ki\u1ec3m tra t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng in \u1edf t\u1ea7ng tr\u1ec7t xem sao.<\/p>

Denise Matova (10:18 sáng)
Có m\u1ed9t gói hàng t\u1eeb Schrantz Farm Organics trong phòng th\u01b0, nh\u01b0ng không có tên trên \u0111ó.<\/p>

Oliver Koh (10:18 sáng)
Ch\u1eafc là c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ó. B\u1ea1n vui lòng xem l\u1ea1i phi\u1ebfu giao hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

Denise Matova (10:19 sáng)
Xin l\u1ed7i, nó có tên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trên \u0111ó. Nó quá nh\u1ecf nên tôi không nh\u1eadn ra.<\/p>

Oliver Koh (10:20 sáng)
Tuy\u1ec7t quá! B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 g\u1eedi gói hàng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

Denise Matova (10:20 sáng)
Không v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì. Dù sao thì m\u1ea5y phút n\u1eefa tôi c\u0169ng s\u1ebd lên l\u1ea7u.<\/p>

Oliver Koh (10:21 sáng)
\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why did Mr. Koh start the online chat discussion?
childrens.answers: ["He received a damaged package","He has a meeting with a client soon","He is expecting some important documents","He delivered a shipment to the wrong person"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ông Koh ph\u1ea3i th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn?<\/p>

A. Ông \u1ea5y nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t ki\u1ec7n hàng nguy hi\u1ec3m<\/p>

B. Ông \u1ea5y có cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp v\u1edbi khách hàng ngay bây gi\u1edd<\/p>

C. Ông \u1ea5y mong \u0111\u1ee3i nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tài li\u1ec7u quan tr\u1ecdng <\/p>

D. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ã giao hàng nh\u1ea7m ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Do you know if a package has arrived for me? I was supposed to get a delivery of some documents today, but maybe they were sent to someone else by mistake.<\/p>","en":"

Why did Mr. Koh start the online chat discussion?<\/p>

A. He received a damaged package<\/p>

B. He has a meeting with a client soon<\/p>

C. He is expecting some important documents<\/p>

D. He delivered a shipment to the wrong person<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Do you know if a package has arrived for me? I was supposed to get a delivery of some documents today, but maybe they were sent to someone else by mistake.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Koskinen recommend doing?

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

childrens.title: At 10:19 A.M., what does Ms. Matova most likely mean when she writes, "Sorry"?
childrens.answers: ["She misplaced a delivery slip","She arrived late to work today","She would like Mr. Koh to repeat his instructions","She made a mistake reading a label"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lúc 10h19, ý c\u1ee7a cô Matova là gì khi nói \"xin l\u1ed7i\"<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y làm th\u1ea5t l\u1ea1c phi\u1ebfu giao hàng<\/p>

B. Hôm nay cô \u1ea5y \u0111i làm mu\u1ed9n<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n ông Kol l\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y m\u1eafc l\u1ed7i khi \u0111\u1ecdc nhãn<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: It does have your name on it. It was so small I didn’t notice it.<\/p>","en":"

At 10:19 A.M., what does Ms. Matova most likely mean when she writes, \"Sorry\"?<\/p>

A. She misplaced a delivery slip<\/p>

B. She arrived late to work today<\/p>

C. She would like Mr. Koh to repeat his instructions<\/p>

D. She made a mistake reading a label<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: It does have your name on it. It was so small I didn’t notice it.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Won Ho Kim
Kính g\u1eedi: \u0110\u1ed9i ng\u0169 qu\u1ea3n lý
Ngày: 12 tháng 8
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: C\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n s\u1ef1 hài lòng c\u1ee7a nhân viên<\/p>

G\u1eedi Nhóm qu\u1ea3n lý:
Trong vài tháng t\u1edbi, b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1 s\u1ebd tham gia th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1edbi Nhóm qu\u1ea3n lý v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c t\u0103ng n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t và s\u1ef1 hài lòng c\u1ee7a nhân viên.<\/p>

Giao ti\u1ebfp t\u1eeb xa là m\u1ed9t cách ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn mà nhi\u1ec1u công ty \u0111ang s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng vì nó cho phép nhân viên làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 khó hoàn thành trong m\u1ed9t v\u0103n phòng v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y r\u1eaby s\u1ef1 gián \u0111o\u1ea1n, trong \u0111ó nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf nhà toàn ho\u1eb7c bán th\u1eddi gian. V\u1edbi d\u1ef1 án c\u1ea5u hình l\u1ea1i tòa nhà s\u1eafp di\u1ec5n ra vào tháng Giêng, chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 xem xét li\u1ec7u giao ti\u1ebfp t\u1eeb xa có ph\u1ea3i là m\u1ed9t gi\u1ea3i pháp t\u1ed1t cho công ty c\u1ee7a chúng ta hay không. Quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a chúng ta v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này s\u1ebd \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn cách s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp l\u1ea1i không gian làm vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

Tôi vi\u1ebft th\u01b0 này \u0111\u1ec3 yêu c\u1ea7u ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. L\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng ch\u01b0a có quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh nào v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec5n thông \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01b0a ra. T\u1ea1i th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m này, b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1 ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n là thu th\u1eadp thông tin. Vui lòng hoàn thành kh\u1ea3o sát vi\u1ec5n thông trên trang web Nhân s\u1ef1. Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n tìm liên k\u1ebft \u1edf phía bên trái c\u1ee7a trang ch\u1ee7.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n tr\u01b0\u1edbc và vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào.<\/p>

Won Ho Kim
qu\u1ea3n lý ngu\u1ed3n nhân l\u1ef1c
GHTY Engineering, Inc<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 sách qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf Uppsala
22-24 tháng 9 • H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Berglund • Uppsala, Th\u1ee5y \u0110i\u1ec3n
L\u1ecbch trình vào Th\u1ee9 Sáu, 22 Tháng Chín<\/p>

Ý ki\u1ebfn công chúng 12:00 tr\u01b0a-01:00 chi\u1ec1u, Salon A
\u0110ang l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n \u0111\u1ec3 qu\u1ea3ng bá cu\u1ed1n sách m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t Outthinking Public Opinion, tác gi\u1ea3 Damian Schnauz d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Sách Qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf Uppsala \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t này, \u0111\u1eb7t câu h\u1ecfi và ký t\u1eb7ng \u0111\u1ed9c gi\u1ea3<\/p>

Khóa h\u1ecdc Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u v\u1ec1 Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0110\u1ed3 h\u1ecda 1: 30-2: 30 CH, Trung tâm Truy\u1ec1n thông Tr\u1ef1c quan
Các nhà thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 chuyên nghi\u1ec7p Allen Doubek và Ivanette Lacasse s\u1ebd trình bày các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt h\u1eefu ích và cung c\u1ea5p cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i th\u1ef1c hành th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf.<\/p>

H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o v\u1ec1 Xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n Tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn 3: 00-4: 30 CH, Thính phòng Lindqvist
Phát hành và qu\u1ea3ng bá sách \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed và sách nói trên Internet. Di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3: Kenneth Pulaski, t\u1ed5ng biên t\u1eadp c\u1ee7a Vendler Publishing, và Tina Savona, giám \u0111\u1ed1c marketing t\u1ea1i Vendler Publishing. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các tài li\u1ec7u \u0111i kèm s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bán t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m ngay tr\u01b0\u1edbc và sau h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o.<\/p>

\u0110\u1ed9c gi\u1ea3 trong th\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 5: 00-6: 30 CH, Phòng 210
Ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 thúc \u0111\u1ea9y hay kìm hãm kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng \u0111\u1ecdc vi\u1ebft? Tranh lu\u1eadn do Greg Gunnarson ki\u1ec3m duy\u1ec7t.<\/p>

• \u0110\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i này ho\u1eb7c b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 bu\u1ed5i nào khác, hãy mua vé vào c\u1eeda hàng ngày v\u1edbi giá 100 kr.
• L\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng không b\u1eaft bu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 cho b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 bu\u1ed5i nào, nh\u01b0ng ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i có h\u1ea1n, vì v\u1eady vui lòng \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1edbc gi\u1edd d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn vài phút \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o có ch\u1ed7. C\u0169ng l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh, nh\u01b0ng không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép quay video cho b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 bu\u1ed5i di\u1ec5n thuy\u1ebft nào.
• Có s\u1eb5n các b\u1eefa \u0103n t\u1ea1i các \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m trong toàn b\u1ed9 H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Berglund. Thông tin v\u1ec1 ch\u1ed7 \u1edf có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea5y trên trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i uibf.se\/hotels.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is suggested about the first day of the Uppsala International Book Fair?
childrens.answers: ["It is being organized by a team of publishers","No sessions are scheduled for the morning hours","Attendance is expected to be the highest on that day","Mr. Schnauz will announce the subject of his next book"]

\u0110i\u1ec1u nào sau \u0111ây là \u0111úng khi nói v\u1ec1 ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf Sách Uppsala?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c b\u1edfi \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 nhà xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n<\/p>

D. Ông Schnauz s\u1ebd thông báo ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1ee7a cu\u1ed1n sách ti\u1ebfp theo<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Công ty Mountain and Forest
D\u1eabn \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 Ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ngThi\u1ebft b\u1ecb C\u1eafm tr\u1ea1i và \u0110i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài<\/p>

Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed ho\u1eb7c qua \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1eed lý \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eb5n sàng giao hàng g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c. Các \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng tùy ch\u1ec9nh và cá nhân hóa có th\u1ec3 m\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m ngày \u0111\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao.
Vui lòng g\u1eedi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi ho\u1eb7c th\u1eafc m\u1eafc nào \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i service@mountainandforest.ca. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi trong vòng 24 gi\u1edd.
Giá v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi:<\/p>
Giá \u0111\u1eb7t hàng có thu\u1ebf<\/td>Giao hàng qua \u0111êm (1 ngày)<\/td>Giao hàng nhanh (3 ngày)<\/td>Giao hàng tiêu chu\u1ea9n (6 - 8 ngày)<\/td><\/tr>
D\u01b0\u1edbi $25<\/td>$8<\/td>$5<\/td>$3<\/td><\/tr>
T\u1eeb $25 - $100<\/td>$13<\/td>$7<\/td>$5<\/td><\/tr>
Trên $100<\/td>$18<\/td>$15<\/td>Mi\u1ec5n phí<\/td><\/tr><\/tbody><\/table>

T\u1edbi: service@mountainandforest.ca
T\u1eeb: jinheeshin@sharemail.ca
Ngày: 10 tháng 1
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: \u0110\u1eb7t hàng B75022
G\u1ea7n \u0111ây tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t hàng v\u1edbi giá 135 \u0111ô la cho \u0111ôi giày \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài và m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc áo khoác gi\u1eef nhi\u1ec7t dành cho chuy\u1ebfn c\u1eafm tr\u1ea1i vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này. Theo xác nh\u1eadn mà tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1i th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m mua hàng, \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a tôi l\u1ebd ra \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn ngày hôm qua. Vì tôi \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 thêm phí v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n trong ba ngày, nên tôi \u0111ã hy v\u1ecdng r\u1eb1ng \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a mình s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn k\u1ecbp th\u1eddi. Nh\u01b0ng \u0111\u01a1n ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ebfn nên tôi yêu c\u1ea7u hoàn l\u1ea1i chi phí v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n. Ngoài ra, n\u1ebfu \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a tôi ch\u01b0a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao vào ngày mai, vui lòng h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a tôi vì tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i mua các m\u1eb7t hàng t\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ef1 t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Jin-Hee Shin<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"\"

Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i và Công nghi\u1ec7p (STI) “Vai trò c\u1ee7a Giáo d\u1ee5c T\u1eeb xa trong \u0110ào t\u1ea1o Chuyên nghi\u1ec7p” \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Thành ph\u1ed1 Abu Dhabi, 11-13 tháng 10
B\u1ea2N TH\u1ea2O: L\u1ecbch trình vào Th\u1ee9 T\u01b0, ngày 11 tháng 10
7:30 A.M.-9:00 A.M. \u0110\u0103ng kí h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb
9:00 A.M.-9:10 A.M. L\u1ec5 khai m\u1ea1c và chào m\u1eebng: Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch Yasmin AI Gaood
9:15 A.M.-10:00 A.M. Bài phát bi\u1ec3u khai m\u1ea1c: Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch STI Ayumi Murakami
10:05 A.M.-10:50 A.M. Tiêu \u0111\u1ec1 bài thuy\u1ebft trình ch\u01b0a rõ: \u0111\u1ea1i bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn, \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc nông nghi\u1ec7p Yaounde, Cameroon
10:55 A.M.-11:40 A.M. Tài nguyên Tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn Sáng t\u1ea1o: Chia Po Cheng, Vi\u1ec7n qu\u1ea3n lý kinh doanh \u0110ài B\u1eafc
11:45 A.M.-1:20 P.M. \u0102n tr\u01b0a (trung tâm khuôn viên Turquoise)
1:30 P.M.-2:15 P.M. Ngành công nghi\u1ec7p giáo d\u1ee5c t\u1eeb xa: \u0111\u1ea1i bi\u1ec3u t\u1eeb Scotland \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn
2:20 P.M.-3:05 P.M. C\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng n\u1ed9i dung khóa h\u1ecdc: Andrei Durchenko, H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n báo chí Nga
3:10 P.M.-4:00 P.M. H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u1ecdc: Marcel Paralta, Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Nha khoa NHi Asuncion, Paraguay<\/p>

 <\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Ayumi Murakami <amurakami@sti.org>
Kính g\u1eedi: Yasmin Al Gaood <yasmin.algaood@cuad.ac.ae>
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: V \/ v: D\u1ef1 th\u1ea3o l\u1ecbch h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb cho Th\u1ee9 T\u01b0
Ngày: 25 tháng 8<\/p>

Xin chào, Yasmin,
Theo yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, tôi \u0111ã \u0111i\u1ec1n vào các v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê là v\u1eabn còn tr\u1ed1ng trong l\u1ecbch trình h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn cho Th\u1ee9 T\u01b0. Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Alban Buchanan \u1edf Scotland nói r\u1eb1ng ông r\u1ea5t háo h\u1ee9c nói v\u1ec1 giáo d\u1ee5c t\u1eeb xa vì nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n trong các h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n \u0111i\u1ec7n \u1ea3nh \u1edf \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a ông. Ngoài ra, ng\u01b0\u1eddi liên h\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a tôi t\u1ea1i Yaounde \u0111ã vi\u1ebft th\u01b0 cho tôi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng cô Marie-Thérèse Tchangou s\u1ebd là \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a tr\u01b0\u1eddng.
Ông Andrei Durchenko \u0111ã thông báo v\u1edbi tôi r\u1eb1ng ông \u1ea5y s\u1ebd rút kh\u1ecfi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb. Cô Melina Vakhitova cùng tr\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ebd thay ông \u1ea5y và n\u1ed9p tiêu \u0111\u1ec1 bài thuy\u1ebft trình trong th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn.
Tôi c\u0169ng mu\u1ed1n nói thêm r\u1eb1ng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn Abu Dhabi lúc 6 gi\u1edd sáng. vào th\u1ee9 T\u01b0. \u0110i\u1ec1u \u0111ó s\u1ebd giúp tôi có nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho bài thuy\u1ebft trình c\u1ee7a mình.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Ayumi<\/p>\""}

questions.text_read:
Health Day at Hesidion Clinic

by Shai Herzog on April 14

Hesidion Clinic hosted a successful Health Awareness Day this past Saturday. The event was held as a way to thank the community for supporting the clinic over the past 15 years. It was well attended by both Hesidion Clinic patients and members of the general public.

Attendees participated in a variety of presentations and everyone received free water bottles, notepads, and other items from event sponsors. Participants who provided a special code were offered a complimentary physical checkup from the team of clinic physicians.

During the event, a sizable line formed at Dr. Thierry Daumas' table. "I came out today to learn about skincare and advances in eye-care technology. But Dr. Daumas' talk about how to prevent cavities and improve oral health provided me with the most helpful information," said attendee Liana Stawinski.

By far the most popular event was nutritionist Jillian Opala's presentation on healthy eating habits. More than 100 people, many of them retirees, flocked to
hear the latest on super foods. The event took nearly twice as long as expected, as Ms. Opala answered a steady stream of participant questions.

Children were delighted to take part in a health contest involving questions about general health and hygiene. The winners received toys and certificates from the game host. The day was such a success that Hesidion Clinic director, Lance Verhoeven, is already considering making it an annual event.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: mstoch@hesidionclinic.com

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Ngày Nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 S\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a Phòng khám Hesidion
Cô Stawinski thân m\u1ebfn,
\u0110ánh giá cao s\u1ef1 g\u1eafn bó c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t khách hàng lâu n\u0103m c\u1ee7a Phòng khám Hesidion, chúng tôi vui m\u1eebng m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Ngày Nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 S\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a phòng khám s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c t\u1ea1i phòng khám vào th\u1ee9 B\u1ea3y, ngày 10 tháng 4. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi th\u1ea5y b\u1ea1n tham d\u1ef1, vì chúng tôi s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ec3 nâng cao nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe trong c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111\u0103ng ký tham gia s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này b\u1eb1ng cách tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi e-mail này tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày 31 tháng 3, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mã có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i phòng khám \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd.
Martin Stoch,
Giám \u0111\u1ed1c Truy\u1ec1n thông, Phòng khám Hesidion<\/p>

Hesidion Clinic Health Awareness Bay, Ngày 10 tháng 4
Nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 và Trách nhi\u1ec7m
• Truy\u1ec1n thông: Martin stch
• Qu\u1ea3ng cáo: Adilene Walker
• Trình bày: Jillian opala (Dinh d\u01b0\u1ee1ng), Lance Verhoeven (Th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c)
• Trò ch\u01a1i s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe cho tr\u1ebb em: Susan Hayashi
• Ki\u1ec3m tra s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe \/ Nói chuy\u1ec7n: Anne Spillane, Rami Al-Araj, Kurt Yin, Thierry baumas
b\u1edfi Shai Herzog vào ngày 14 tháng 4<\/p>

Phòng khám Hesidion \u0111ã t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c thành công Ngày Nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 S\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe vào th\u1ee9 B\u1ea3y v\u1eeba qua. S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t cách c\u1ea3m \u01a1n c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111ã \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 phòng khám trong h\u01a1n 15 n\u0103m qua. Nó \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 tham gia c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 b\u1ec7nh nhân Phòng khám Hesidion và các thành viên c\u1ee7a công chúng.<\/p>

Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 \u0111ã tham gia nhi\u1ec1u bu\u1ed5i thuy\u1ebft trình và m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec1u nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chai n\u01b0\u1edbc mi\u1ec5n phí, gi\u1ea5y ghi chú và các v\u1eadt ph\u1ea9m khác t\u1eeb các nhà tài tr\u1ee3 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia cung c\u1ea5p mã \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 bác s\u0129 phòng khám cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ki\u1ec3m tra s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe mi\u1ec5n phí.<\/p>

Trong s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này, m\u1ed9t hàng ch\u1eef khá l\u1edbn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t trên bàn c\u1ee7a Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Thierry Daumas. \"Hôm nay tôi \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 ch\u0103m sóc da và nh\u1eefng ti\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 trong công ngh\u1ec7 ch\u0103m sóc m\u1eaft. Nh\u01b0ng bu\u1ed5i nói chuy\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Daumas v\u1ec1 cách ng\u0103n ng\u1eeba sâu r\u0103ng và c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe r\u0103ng mi\u1ec7ng \u0111ã cung c\u1ea5p cho tôi thông tin h\u1eefu ích nh\u1ea5t\", ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n Liana Stawinski cho bi\u1ebft.<\/p>

Cho \u0111\u1ebfn nay, s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn nh\u1ea5t là bài thuy\u1ebft trình c\u1ee7a chuyên gia dinh d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Jillian Opala v\u1ec1 thói quen \u0103n u\u1ed1ng lành m\u1ea1nh. H\u01a1n 100 ng\u01b0\u1eddi, nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 h\u1ecd \u0111ã ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u, \u0111\u1ed5 xô \u0111\u1ebfn
nghe tin t\u1ee9c m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 siêu th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m. S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n kéo dài g\u1ea7n g\u1ea5p \u0111ôi so v\u1edbi d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn, vì bà Opala \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi m\u1ed9t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh các câu h\u1ecfi c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia.<\/p>

Các em nh\u1ecf r\u1ea5t thích thú khi tham gia cu\u1ed9c thi s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe v\u1edbi các câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe và v\u1ec7 sinh chung. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed3 ch\u01a1i và gi\u1ea5y ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn t\u1eeb ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c trò ch\u01a1i. Ngày này thành công \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ee9c giám \u0111\u1ed1c Phòng khám Hesidion, Lance Verhoeven \u0111ã xem xét bi\u1ebfn nó thành m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u01b0\u1eddng niên.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

NGHIÊN C\u1ee8U KINH DOANH T\u1ea0I SINGAPORE
Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Kinh doanh Singapore (SBS) n\u1eb1m \u1edf trung tâm khu tài chính c\u1ee7a Singapore. Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t các khóa h\u1ecdc ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao nh\u1eb1m chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho sinh viên t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc. Gi\u1eefa các bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdc, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 khám phá thành ph\u1ed1 và trau d\u1ed3i k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i kinh doanh. Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc d\u1ef1a trên n\u1ed9i dung, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 tài chính, kinh t\u1ebf và ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf, c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc v\u1ec1 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 xin h\u1ecdc sau \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc, bao g\u1ed3m phát tri\u1ec3n CV và vi\u1ebft báo cáo cá nhân.
Chúng tôi \u0111ã giúp hàng nghìn sinh viên vào h\u1ecdc các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình sau \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc trên kh\u1eafp th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. Chúng tôi t\u1ef1 hào có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 gi\u1ea3ng viên bán th\u1eddi gian n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng là nh\u1eefng chuyên gia trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd, bao g\u1ed3m Diara Rhodes, giám \u0111\u1ed1c tài chính c\u1ee7a Auto Drive Korea và Farah Wan, phó ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a Kuala Lumpur Union Lenders. \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin v\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 gi\u1ea3ng viên và khóa h\u1ecdc \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u0103ng ký tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn, hãy truy c\u1eadp trang Web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i www.sbs.edu.sg.<\/p>

H\u1ecdc sinh c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ang nói gì?
Ngày 3 tháng 6 b\u1edfi Atsushi Koshi
Tôi \u0111ã tham gia m\u1ed9t khóa h\u1ecdc tài chính t\u1ea1i SBS. Ngôi tr\u01b0\u1eddng hi\u1ec7n tôi \u0111ang theo h\u1ecdc \u1edf Anh có m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n tiên quy\u1ebft mà tôi \u0111ã không hoàn thành khi l\u1ea5y b\u1eb1ng C\u1eed nhân, vì v\u1eady khóa h\u1ecdc tám tu\u1ea7n r\u1ea5t thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n. Tuy nhiên, tôi không th\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ec1n thuê nhà cao trong khu v\u1ef1c, vì v\u1eady tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111i làm, và giao thông trong khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ó r\u1ea5t kinh kh\u1ee7ng. Tôi \u01b0\u1edbc SBS cung c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t ký túc xá cho sinh viên t\u1ea1i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y thì r\u1ea5t tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Gi\u1ea3ng viên c\u1ee7a tôi là Diara Rhodes. M\u1eb7c dù cô \u1ea5y có xu h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111i l\u01b0\u1edbt các bài gi\u1ea3ng, th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec1u ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 trong m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn, nh\u01b0ng tôi \u0111ã h\u1ecdc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u \u0111i\u1ec1u t\u1eeb bài \u0111\u1ecdc và t\u1eeb nh\u1eefng mô t\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf. Cách cô \u1ea5y gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft các v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 kinh doanh là ngu\u1ed3n c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng trong cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a tôi và nó c\u0169ng giúp ích cho tôi trong các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a tôi.<\/p>

T\u1eeb: atsushi.koshi@scholarmail.co.uk
T\u1edbi: sommersell@sbs.edu.sg
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tôi thích bài \u0111ánh giá c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n
Ngày: 15 tháng 8
G\u1eedi Koshi,
Ca\u0309m \u01a1n pha\u0309n hôi cu\u0309a ba\u0323n. B\u1ea1n không ph\u1ea3i là ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea7u tiên nói lên m\u1ed1i quan tâm c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 này. Mong b\u1ea1n thông c\u1ea3m, chúng tôi d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này theo \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. H\u1ecdc sinh tham gia các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc v\u1edbi Hoa K\u1ef3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u s\u1edbm nh\u1ea5t là vào ngày 1 tháng 1 s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t này. Hãy \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111i\u1ec1u này v\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ai \u0111ang ngh\u0129 \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c tham gia m\u1ed9t l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc v\u1edbi US.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Lauri Sommersell<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
SEEKING FULL - TIME LINE COOK

The Delphine Street Grill is a high-profile restaurant serving New Orleans since 1924. We are seeking a line cook to prepare select sauteed items and sauces under the supervision of the executive chef. The ideal candidate will have at least one year of related cooking experience or will have completed a two-year apprenticeship in a well-established restaurant. Demonstrated ability to prepare innovative dishes as well as classic Cajun-style cuisine is required. To apply, go to www.delphinestreetgrill.com/careers.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Delphine Street Grill là m\u1ed9t nhà hàng n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 New Orleans t\u1eeb n\u0103m 1924. Chúng tôi \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp chuyên ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn các món xào và n\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ed1t ch\u1ecdn l\u1ecdc d\u01b0\u1edbi s\u1ef1 giám sát c\u1ee7a b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng. \u1ee8ng viên lý t\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ebd có ít nh\u1ea5t m\u1ed9t n\u0103m kinh nghi\u1ec7m n\u1ea5u \u0103n liên quan ho\u1eb7c s\u1ebd hoàn thành khóa h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7c hai n\u0103m t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t nhà hàng có uy tín. C\u1ea7n có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn các món \u0103n sáng t\u1ea1o c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c ki\u1ec3u Cajun c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký, hãy truy c\u1eadp www.delphinestreetgrill.com\/careers.<\/p>

Tên: Anton Hoàng
E-mail: antonh94@textmail.com
\u0110i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i: 504.555.0177
H\u1ecdc v\u1ea5n liên quan: B\u1eb1ng cao \u0111\u1eb3ng liên k\u1ebft v\u1ec1 ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c, Cao \u0111\u1eb3ng C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng Boudreau
Công ty hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i: River Ferry Café, Line Cook
Th\u1eddi gian làm vi\u1ec7c: Sáu tháng
Công ty tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây: Hotel Lenoir, H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7c
Th\u1eddi gian làm vi\u1ec7c: Hai n\u0103m
Công ty tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây: Picard Seafood, Th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp sinh
Th\u1eddi gian làm vi\u1ec7c: Ba tháng
S\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch: \u0110ính kèm
Danh sách tham kh\u1ea3o: \u0110ính kèm
Th\u01b0 xin vi\u1ec7c:
Tôi r\u1ea5t quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1ecb trí b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1ea1i Delphine Street Grill. Trong sáu tháng qua, tôi là ph\u1ee5 b\u1ebfp cho m\u1ed9t quán cà phê ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 các b\u1eefa \u0103n Cajun truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng. Vì quán cà phê ch\u1ec9 m\u1edbi m\u1edf g\u1ea7n \u0111ây nên tôi ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các món trong th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n. Tôi \u0111ã hoàn thành khóa h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a mình t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng Lenoir, làm vi\u1ec7c cùng v\u1edbi \u0110\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng Eugenie Mirone. Ngoài ra, Ted Overbeck (ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n và ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c\u1ee7a tôi t\u1ea1i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Cao \u0111\u1eb3ng C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng Boudreau) có th\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn, tôi có th\u1ec3 phát tri\u1ec3n các công th\u1ee9c n\u1ea5u \u0103n m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y sáng t\u1ea1o. Trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf, khi \u1edf tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc, tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trao Gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng Sáng t\u1ea1o Xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc cho công th\u1ee9c bánh mì k\u1eb9p ki\u1ec3u Vi\u1ec7t Nam do tôi ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn, hi\u1ec7n \u0111ã có trong th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n t\u1ea1i nhà \u0103n c\u1ee7a tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc.<\/p>

TR\u01af\u1edcNG CAO \u0110NG C\u1ed8NG \u0110\u1ed2NG BOUDREAU
Tr\u01b0\u1eddng ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c
Marie Beaumont
Delphine Street Grill
3248 Ph\u1ed1 Delphine
New Orleans, LA 70117
G\u1eedi bà Beaumont:
Tôi vi\u1ebft th\u01b0 liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u01a1n xin vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a Anton Hoang. Vì anh Overbeck r\u1eddi \u0111i trong h\u1ecdc k\u1ef3 này, anh \u1ea5y \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u tôi tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi thay cho anh \u1ea5y. Anh Hoàng, ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p trong top 5 c\u1ee7a l\u1edbp, th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n k\u1ef9 n\u0103ng n\u1ea5u n\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t và r\u1ea5t ham h\u1ecdc h\u1ecfi. Anh \u1ea5y \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t \u0111ánh giá tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi t\u1eeb Sabine Riou, \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã giám sát quá trình th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp ba tháng c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y. Tôi tin t\u01b0\u1edfng anh Hoàng s\u1ebd là viên ng\u1ecdc quý \u1edf c\u01a1 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Liz Flores
Phó Giám \u0111\u1ed1c Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt \u1ea8m th\u1ef1c<\/p>"}
